2_samweli:1:1: Dawidi abikirwa ko Sawuli na Yonatani bapfuye1.Nuko Sawuli aratanga. Kandi Dawidi atabarutse avuye kwica Abamaleki, ageze i Sikulagi ahasibira kabiri.
2_samweli:1:2: 2.Ku munsi wa gatatu haza umugabo uvuye mu rugerero rwa Sawuli, ashishimuye imyenda ye, yisīze umukungugu mu mutwe, ageze kuri Dawidi yikubita hasi aramuramya.
2_samweli:1:3: 3.Dawidi aramubaza ati “Uraturuka he?” Aramusubiza ati “Ncitse ku icumu mu rugerero rw’Abisirayeli.”
2_samweli:1:4: 4.Dawidi aramubaza ati “Byagenze bite? Ndakwinginze mbwira.” Aramusubiza ati “Abantu bahunze ku rugamba, kandi benshi muri bo baguye mu ntambara barapfa. Sawuli na Yonatani umuhungu we na bo barapfuye.”
2_samweli:1:5: 5.Dawidi abaza uwo muhungu wamubikiye ati “Ariko wabibwiwe n’iki ko Sawuli na Yonatani umuhungu we bapfuye?”
2_samweli:1:6: 6.Uwo muhungu wamubikiraga aravuga ati “Narigenderaga ngeze ku musozi w’i Gilibowa, mbona Sawuli yishita ku icumu, kandi mbona amagare n’abahetswe n’amafarashi bamusatiriye.
2_samweli:1:7: 7.Maze Sawuli akebutse inyuma arambona, arampamagara ndamwitaba nti ‘Karame.’
2_samweli:1:8: 8.Arambaza ati ‘Uri nde?’ Ndamusubiza nti ‘Ndi Umwamaleki.’
2_samweli:1:9: 9.Arambwira ati ‘Nyamuna igira hano unsonge, dore ndembejwe n’umubabaro, kuko nkiri muzima.’
2_samweli:1:10: 10.Nuko ndamwegera, ndamusonga kuko nari menye neza ko atakiri uwo gukira, namara kugwa. Mperako mucuza ikamba ryari ku mutwe n’umuringa wari ku kuboko, none mbizaniye databuja.”
2_samweli:1:11: 11.Dawidi afata imyenda ye arayishishimura, n’abari kumwe na we bose babigenza batyo.
2_samweli:1:12: 12.Bacura umuborogo bararira, biyiriza ubusa bageza nimugoroba, bababajwe na Sawuli n’umuhungu we Yonatani kandi n’abantu b’Uwiteka n’inzu ya Isirayeli, kuko bicishijwe inkota.
2_samweli:1:13: 13.Dawidi abaza uwo muhungu wamubikiye ati “Uri uwa he?” Ati “Ndi umwana w’Umwamaleki w’umunyamahanga.”
2_samweli:1:14: 14.Dawidi aramubaza ati “Ni iki cyatumye udatinya, ugahangara kuramburira ukuboko kwica umuntu Uwiteka yimikishije amavuta?”
2_samweli:1:15: 15.Dawidi ahamagara umwe wo mu basore ati “Mwegere umusumire.” Aramusogota arapfa.
2_samweli:1:16: 16.Dawidi aramubwira ati “Amaraso yawe abe ari wowe aba ku mutwe, kuko akanwa kawe ari ko muhamya nk’uko uvuze ngo ‘Nishe uwo Uwiteka yimikishije amavuta.’ ”
2_samweli:1:17: Dawidi aborogera Sawuli na Yonatani17.Nuko Dawidi aborogera Sawuli n’umuhungu we Yonatani uyu muborogo,
2_samweli:1:18: 18.abategeka kwigisha Abayuda indirimbo y’umuheto, yanditswe mu gitabo cya Yashari.
2_samweli:1:19: 19.“Icyubahiro cyawe, Isirayeli, Cyiciwe mu mpinga z’imisozi! Erega abanyambaraga baraguye!
2_samweli:1:20: 20.Ntimuzabivuge muri Gati, Ntimuzabyamamaze mu nzira z’Abashikeloni, Abakobwa b’Abafilisitiya batanezerwa, Abakobwa b’abatakebwe be kwishimagiza.
2_samweli:1:21: 21.“Mwa misozi y’i Gilibowa mwe, Kuri mwe ntihagatonde ikime, ntihakagwe imvura, Ntihakabe imirima yera imyaka y’amaturo, Kuko ari ho ingabo y’umunyambaraga yagwanye umugayo, Ni yo ngabo ya Sawuli, nk’iyo utimikishijwe amavuta.
2_samweli:1:22: 22.Umuheto wa Yonatani ntiwasubiraga inyuma, Ngo uve ku maraso y’abishwe, No ku banyambaraga b’ibihangange, Kandi inkota ya Sawuli ntiyavukaga.
2_samweli:1:23: 23.“Sawuli na Yonatani bari beza, Bafite igikundiro bakiriho, Kandi mu ipfa ryabo ntibaguye ukubiri. Bari abanyamuvumbuko kurusha ikizu, Bari abanyamaboko kurusha intare.
2_samweli:1:24: 24.“Bakobwa ba Isirayeli, nimuririre Sawuli, Wabambikaga imyenda y’imihemba yo kurimbana, Warimbishaga imyambaro yanyu izahabu.
2_samweli:1:25: 25.“Erega abanyambaraga baguye mu ntambara hagati! Yonatani yiciwe mu mpinga z’imisozi yawe.
2_samweli:1:26: 26.“Unteye agahinda mwene data Yonatani, Wambereye uw’igikundiro bihebuje. Urukundo wankundaga rwari igitangaza, Rwarutaga urukundo rw’abagore.
2_samweli:1:27: 27.“Erega abanyambaraga baraguye, N’intwaro zabo zirashize!”
2_samweli:2:1: Dawidi yimikwa n’Abayuda1.Hanyuma y’ibyo Dawidi agisha Uwiteka inama ati “Mbese nzamuke njye mu mudugudu umwe mu y’Abayuda?” Uwiteka aramubwira ati “Zamuka.” Dawidi ati “Njye he?” Aramusubiza ati “I Heburoni.”
2_samweli:2:2: 2.Nuko Dawidi azamukana n’abagore be bombi, Ahinowamu w’i Yezerēli, na Abigayili wari muka Nabali Umunyakarumeli.
2_samweli:2:3: 3.Kandi n’abantu bari kumwe na Dawidi bose arabazamukana, umuntu wese n’abo mu rugo rwe, batura mu midugudu y’i Heburoni.
2_samweli:2:4: 4.Bukeye Abayuda baraza bamwimikishirizayo amavuta, kugira ngo abe umwami w’umuryango w’Abayuda. Bukeye babwira Dawidi bati “Ab’i Yabeshi y’i Galeyadi ni bo bahambye Sawuli.”
2_samweli:2:5: 5.Nuko Dawidi atuma intumwa ku b’i Yabeshi y’i Galeyadi arababwira ati “Muragahirwa n’Uwiteka, kuko mwagiriye shobuja Sawuli imbabazi mutyo, mukamuhamba.
2_samweli:2:6: 6.Nuko rero Uwiteka abagirire imbabazi n’umurava, nanjye nzabītura iyo neza, kuko mwagize mutyo.
2_samweli:2:7: 7.Nuko none mugire amaboko mube intwari, kuko shobuja Sawuli yapfuye, kandi ab’umuryango w’Abayuda banyimikishije amavuta ngo mbe umwami wabo.”
2_samweli:2:8: Abagaragu ba Sawuli n’aba Dawidi barwana8.Bukeye Abuneri mwene Neri, umugaba w’ingabo za Sawuli, yari yarajyanye Ishibosheti mwene Sawuli, aramwambutsa amujyana i Mahanayimu.
2_samweli:2:9: 9.Amwimikirayo ngo abe umwami w’i Galeyadi n’uw’Abashuri, n’uw’i Yezerēli n’uw’Abefurayimu, n’uw’Ababenyamini n’uw’Abisirayeli bose.
2_samweli:2:10: 10.(Kandi Ishibosheti mwene Sawuli yari amaze imyaka mirongo ine ubwo yimaga muri Isirayeli, amara imyaka ibiri ari ku ngoma.) Ariko umuryango wa Yuda wayobokaga Dawidi.
2_samweli:2:11: 11.Kandi igihe Dawidi yamaze i Heburoni ari umwami w’umuryango wa Yuda, ni imyaka irindwi n’amezi atandatu.
2_samweli:2:12: 12.Bukeye Abuneri mwene Neri n’abagaragu ba Ishibosheti mwene Sawuli barimuka, bava i Mahanayimu bajya i Gibeyoni.
2_samweli:2:13: 13.Yowabu mwene Seruya na we n’abagaragu ba Dawidi barasohoka, bahurira na bo ku kidendezi cy’i Gibeyoni bicara hasi, bamwe hakurya y’icyo kidendezi, abandi hakuno yacyo.
2_samweli:2:14: 14.Abuneri abwira Yowabu ati “Ndakwinginze, abasore bahaguruke batwiyerekere.” Yowabu ati “Nibahaguruke.”
2_samweli:2:15: 15.Nuko barahaguruka barababara, abo mu ruhande rw’Ababenyamini n’abagaragu ba Ishibosheti mwene Sawuli baba cumi na babiri, kandi abo mu ruhande rwa Dawidi na bo baba cumi na babiri, baherako barasakirana.
2_samweli:2:16: 16.Umuntu wese asingira umutwe wa mugenzi we, batikagurana inkota mu mbavu, bacurangukira aho icyarimwe. Ni cyo cyatumye aho bahahimba Helikatihasurimu, hari i Gibeyoni.
2_samweli:2:17: 17.Uwo munsi haba intambara ikomeye cyane, Abuneri n’Abisirayeli baraneshwa, bahunga abagaragu ba Dawidi.
2_samweli:2:18: 18.Kandi bene Seruya batatu bari bahari ni bo aba: Yowabu na Abishayi na Asaheli, kandi Asaheli uwo yari nyakayaga nk’isirabo yo mu gasozi.
2_samweli:2:19: 19.Nuko Asaheli akurikira Abuneri, agenda adakebakeba iburyo cyangwa ibumoso ngo ateshuke Abuneri.
2_samweli:2:20: 20.Abuneri akebutse inyuma aravuga ati “Asaheli we, mbega ni wowe?” Na we aramusubiza ati “Ni jye.”
2_samweli:2:21: 21.Abuneri aramubwira ati “Gana iburyo aho cyangwa ibumoso, ufate umusore umwambure intwaro ze.” Ariko Asaheli yanga kumuvirira.
2_samweli:2:22: 22.Abuneri yongera kubwira Asaheli ati “Nyura hirya winkurikira. Mbese nagutsinda aha waba uzize iki? Uretse ibyo, nakubitana amaso nte na Yowabu mwene so?”
2_samweli:2:23: 23.Ariko yanga guteshuka. Ni cyo cyatumye Abuneri amutikura umuhunda w’icumu rye ku nda rigahinguka inyuma. Asaheli yikubita hasi agwa aho. Abantu bageze aho Asaheli yaguye barahagungirira.
2_samweli:2:24: 24.Ariko Yowabu na Abishayi bakurikira Abuneri, bageze ku musozi wa Ama uteganye n’i Giya mu nzira ijya mu butayu bw’i Gibeyoni, izuba ribarengeraho.
2_samweli:2:25: 25.Nuko Ababenyamini bateranira kuri Abuneri baba umutwe umwe, bahagarara mu mpinga y’umusozi.
2_samweli:2:26: 26.Abuneri ahamagara Yowabu aravuga ati “Mbese inkota izahora ibaga iteka? Ntuzi ko amaherezo yabyo azaba umubabaro usharira? Ariko uzageza he kudategeka abantu ngo barekere aho gukurikirana bene wabo?”
2_samweli:2:27: 27.Yowabu aramusubiza ati “Ndahiye Imana ihoraho, iyaba utavuze iryo jambo abantu bajyaga gukesha ijoro, umuntu wese agikurikiranye mwene se.”
2_samweli:2:28: 28.Nuko Yowabu avuza ikondera abantu bose barahagarara, ntibakomeza gukurikirana Abisirayeli cyangwa kubarwanya ukundi.
2_samweli:2:29: 29.Nuko Abuneri n’ingabo ze bagenda ijoro ryose banyura muri Araba, bambuka Yorodani banyura i Bitironi yose, basohora i Mahanayimu.
2_samweli:2:30: 30.Yowabu na we aragaruka arorera gukurikira Abuneri, amaze guteranya abantu bose, mu bagaragu ba Dawidi haburamo abantu cumi n’icyenda, na Asaheli.
2_samweli:2:31: 31.Ariko abagaragu ba Dawidi bari banesheje Ababenyamini n’ingabo za Abuneri, kandi bishemo abantu magana atatu na mirongo itandatu.
2_samweli:2:32: 32.Nuko baterura Asaheli bamuhamba mu mva ya se i Betelehemu. Yowabu n’ingabo ze baherako bagenda ijoro ryose, bucya bageze i Heburoni.
2_samweli:3:1: 1.Nuko ab’inzu ya Sawuli n’ab’inzu ya Dawidi bamara igihe kirekire barwana, Dawidi akajya arushaho gukomera, ariko ab’inzu ya Sawuli barushaho gucogora.
2_samweli:3:2: 2.Kandi Dawidi yabyariye i Heburoni abana b’abahungu: uw’imfura yitwaga Amunoni wa Ahinowamu w’i Yezerēli,
2_samweli:3:3: 3.uw’ubuheta ni Kileyaba wa Abigayili wari muka Nabali Umunyakarumeli, uwa gatatu ni Abusalomu wa Māka umukobwa wa Talumayi umwami w’i Geshuri,
2_samweli:3:4: 4.uwa kane ni Adoniya umuhungu wa Hagiti, uwa gatanu ni Shefatiya umuhungu wa Abitali,
2_samweli:3:5: 5.uwa gatandatu ni Itureyamu wa Egila muka Dawidi. Abo ni bo Dawidi yabyariye i Heburoni.
2_samweli:3:6: Abuneri yangana na Ishibosheti6.Icyo gihe cy’intambara zo mu b’inzu ya Sawuli n’ab’iya Dawidi, Abuneri yihinduye ukomeye mu rugo rwa Sawuli.
2_samweli:3:7: 7.Kandi Sawuli yari afite inshoreke yitwaga Risipa umukobwa wa Ayiya. Bukeye Ishibosheti abwira Abuneri ati “Ni iki cyatumye utaha ku nshoreke ya data?”
2_samweli:3:8: 8.Nuko Abuneri arakazwa cyane n’amagambo Ishibosheti amubwiye, aramusubiza ati “Mbese ndi igihanga cy’imbwa y’Abayuda? Ubu ngirira neza inzu ya so Sawuli na bene se n’incuti ze, singūhāne mu maboko ya Dawidi, ariko none umpamije icyaha kuri uwo mugore?
2_samweli:3:9: 9.Nintagirira Dawidi nk’uko Uwiteka yamurahiye, Imana ibimpore jyewe Abuneri, ndetse bikabije:
2_samweli:3:10: 10.ni ko gukura ubwami ku nzu ya Sawuli ngashinga intebe y’ubwami bwa Dawidi, akaba ari we utegeka Abisirayeli n’Abayuda, uhereye i Dani ukageza i Bērisheba.”
2_samweli:3:11: 11.Nuko Ishibosheti abura ikindi asubiza Abuneri kuko yamutinyaga.
2_samweli:3:12: Abuneri yuzura na Dawidi12.Bukeye Abuneri atuma intumwa ze bwite kuri Dawidi ati “Nyir’iki gihugu ni nde? Dusezerane isezerano, kandi nzafatanya nawe kuguhindūrira Abisirayeli bose.”
2_samweli:3:13: 13.Dawidi aramusubiza ati “Ni byiza. Nuko nzasezerana nawe isezerano, ariko hariho kimwe nkwaka: ntabwo uzarebana nanjye keretse ubanje kuzana Mikali mwene Sawuli ubwo uzaza kundeba.”
2_samweli:3:14: 14.Maze Dawidi atuma kuri Ishibosheti mwene Sawuli aramubwira ati “Mpa umugore wanjye Mikali nakoye ibinyita ijana by’Abafilisitiya.”
2_samweli:3:15: 15.Nuko Ishibosheti aramutumira, amwaka umugabo we Palutiyeli mwene Layishi.
2_samweli:3:16: 16.Maze umugabo we aramuherekeza agenda arira inzira yose, amugeza i Bahurimu amukurikiye. Agezeyo Abuneri aramubwira ati “Hoshi subirayo.” Nuko asubirayo.
2_samweli:3:17: Yowabu ahōrera Asaheli, yica Abuneri17.Bukeye Abuneri ajya inama n’abatware ba Isirayeli arababwira ati “Mu gihe cyashize mwashakaga Dawidi ko aba umwami wanyu,
2_samweli:3:18: 18.none nimubirangize kuko Uwiteka yavuze ibya Dawidi ati ‘Umugaragu wanjye Dawidi ni we nzakirisha abantu banjye Isirayeli amaboko y’Abafilisitiya, n’ay’ababisha babo bose.’ ”
2_samweli:3:19: 19.Kandi Abuneri abivugira mu matwi y’Ababenyamini. Bukeye arahaguruka ajya i Heburoni, avugira mu matwi ya Dawidi ibyo Abisirayeli n’umuryango w’Ababenyamini bose bishimiye byose.
2_samweli:3:20: 20.Nuko Abuneri n’abamushagaye makumyabiri basanga Dawidi i Heburoni. Dawidi aremera Abuneri n’abo bari kumwe ibirori.
2_samweli:3:21: 21.Maze Abuneri abwira Dawidi ati “Nzahaguruka ngende nteranirize Abisirayeli bose ku mwami databuja, kugira ngo basezerane nawe isezerano, ubone gutegeka abo umutima wawe ushaka bose.” Hanyuma Dawidi asezerera Abuneri agenda amahoro.
2_samweli:3:22: 22.Kandi abagaragu ba Dawidi na Yowabu bari bagiye kunyaga, bukeye batabarukana iminyago myinshi. Ariko Abuneri yari atakiri kumwe na Dawidi i Heburoni, kuko yari yamusezereye akagenda amahoro.
2_samweli:3:23: 23.Yowabu n’ingabo ze zose bari kumwe bagisesekara aho, babwira Yowabu bati “Abuneri mwene Neri yaje i bwami, kandi umwami yamusezereye agenda amahoro.”
2_samweli:3:24: 24.Nuko Yowabu ajya i bwami abaza umwami ati “Ibyo wakoze ni ibiki? Ariko Abuneri ko yaje iwawe, ni iki cyatumye umusezerera akagenda rwose?
2_samweli:3:25: 25.Nawe ntuzi ko Abuneri mwene Neri yazanywe no kukubeshya, no kugenzura uko utabara n’uko utabaruka, no kugenzura ibyo ukora byose?”
2_samweli:3:26: 26.Nuko Yowabu ashengurutse kwa Dawidi acisha intumwa ruhinganyuma zikurikira Abuneri, bamugarurira ku iriba rya Sira ariko Dawidi atabizi.
2_samweli:3:27: 27.Abuneri akigera i Heburoni Yowabu amukura mu bandi, amujyana mu irembo hagati ngo avugane na we biherereye. Bahageze amutikura ku nda amutsinda aho, amuhōreye amaraso ya murumuna we Asaheli.
2_samweli:3:28: 28.Hanyuma Dawidi abyumvise aravuga ati “Jye n’ubwami bwanjye ntituzagibwaho n’urubanza rw’amaraso ya Abuneri mwene Neri, imbere y’Uwiteka iminsi yose.
2_samweli:3:29: 29.Ahubwo ruzabe kuri Yowabu no ku rugo rwa se rwose, kandi mu rugo rwa Yobabu ntihakabure uninda cyangwa umubembe, cyangwa ugendera ku kibando cyangwa uwicishwa inkota cyangwa umuhorote.”
2_samweli:3:30: 30.Uko ni ko Yowabu na Abishayi mwene nyina bishe Abuneri, kuko yari yiciye mwene se Asaheli mu ntambara y’i Gibeyoni.
2_samweli:3:31: Dawidi aririra Abuneri31.Dawidi aherako abwira Yowabu n’abari kumwe na we bose ati “Nimushishimure imyenda yanyu, mukenyere ibigunira muriririre imbere ya Abuneri.” Nuko Umwami Dawidi akurikira ikiriba cye.
2_samweli:3:32: 32.Maze Abuneri bamuhamba i Heburoni, umwami ashyira hejuru umuborogo aririra ku gituro cya Abuneri, abantu bose bacika imiborogo.
2_samweli:3:33: 33.Umwami aborogera Abuneri aravuga ati “Mbese Abuneri yari akwiriye gupfa nk’igicucu?
2_samweli:3:34: 34.Amaboko yawe ataboshywe, Kandi ibirenge byawe bitaboheshejwe iminyururu, Nk’uko umuntu agwa imbere y’abanyabyaha, Ni ko uguye.” Nuko abantu bongera kumuririra.
2_samweli:3:35: 35.Hanyuma abantu bose baza guhata Dawidi ngo afungure hakiri kare, ariko Dawidi ararahira aravuga ati “Nindya ku mutsima cyangwa ikindi cyose ntarageza ko izuba rirenga, Imana ibimpore ndetse bikabije.”
2_samweli:3:36: 36.Abantu bose babyitegereje barabyishimira, ndetse ibyo umwami yakoraga byose ni ko byanezezaga abantu bose.
2_samweli:3:37: 37.Nuko uwo munsi abantu bose n’Abisirayeli bose, bamenya ko bitaturutse ku mwami kwica Abuneri mwene Neri.
2_samweli:3:38: 38.Umwami abwira abagaragu be ati “Aho muzi ko ubu mu Bisirayeli hapfuye igikomangoma cyari umugabo ukomeye?
2_samweli:3:39: 39.Kandi nanjye naho ndi umwami wimikishijwe amavuta, ariko ubu ndi umunebwe. Kandi abo bagabo bene Seruya ni ibigaganyare, barananira. Uwiteka yiture inkozi y’ibibi ibihwanye no gukiranirwa kwayo.”
2_samweli:4:1: 1.Bukeye Ishibosheti mwene Sawuli yumvise ko Abuneri yaguye i Heburoni aracogora, Abisirayeli bose bahagarika umutima.
2_samweli:4:2: 2.Kandi Ishibosheti uwo mwene Sawuli yari afite abatware b’ingabo babiri: umwe yitwaga Bāna, undi yitwaga Rekabu, bene Rimoni w’i Bēroti wo mu muryango wa Benyamini. (Kuko i Bēroti habarwaga ku Babenyamini,
2_samweli:4:3: 3.kandi ab’i Bēroti bari barahungiye i Gitayimu, basuhukirayo na bugingo n’ubu.)
2_samweli:4:4: 4.Kandi Yonatani mwene Sawuli yari afite umwana waremaye amaguru. Ubwo imbitsi yavaga i Yezerēli kubika Sawuli na Yonatani, uwo mwana yari amaze imyaka itanu avutse, maze umurezi we aramubatura arahunga. Akimwirukankana ahunga, aramunyihuka yikubita hasi, aherako aramugara. Izina ry’uwo mwana yitwaga Mefibosheti.
2_samweli:4:5: Urupfu rwa Ishibosheti5.Bukeye bene Rimoni w’i Bēroti, Rekabu na Bāna, baraza basohora kwa Ishibosheti ku manywa y’ihangu, basanga arambaraye.
2_samweli:4:6: 6.Binjira mu nzu ye nk’abashaka kudaha ingano, nuko bamutikura inkota ku nda. Rekabu na Bāna mwene se baherako barahunga.
2_samweli:4:7: 7.(Uko ni ko bamwishe, binjiye mu nzu ye basanga arambaraye ku gisasiro hakinze urusika, baramutikura baramwica, bamuca igihanga barakijyana, bagenda ijoro ryose mu nzira ijya muri Araba.)
2_samweli:4:8: 8.Maze icyo gihanga cya Ishibosheti bagishyira Dawidi i Heburoni babwira umwami bati “Ngiki igihanga cya Ishibosheti mwene Sawuli umwanzi wawe, wagenzaga ubugingo bwawe. Ubu Uwiteka ahōreye inzigo umwami databuja kuri Sawuli n’urubyaro rwe.”
2_samweli:4:9: 9.Dawidi asubiza Rekabu na mwene se Bāna, bene Rimoni w’i Bēroti arababwira ati “Ndahiye Uwiteka Uhoraho wacunguye ubugingo bwanjye mu byago byose:
2_samweli:4:10: 10.kera hariho umuntu waje arambwira ati ‘Sawuli yapfuye’, yibwiraga ko anzaniye inkuru nziza, mperako ndamufata mwicira i Sikulagi. Ibyo ni byo bihembo namuhembeye inkuru ze.
2_samweli:4:11: 11.None se nk’abantu babi biciye umukiranutsi mu nzu ye ku gisasiro, sinarushaho cyane kubahōra amaraso ye, nkabakura mu isi?”
2_samweli:4:12: 12.Maze Dawidi ategeka abasore be barabica, babaca ibikonjo n’ibirenge, babamanika iruhande rw’iriba ry’i Heburoni. Kandi igihanga cya Ishibosheti barakijyana, bagihamba mu gituro cya Abuneri i Heburoni.
2_samweli:5:1: Dawidi aba umwami w’Abisirayeli bose(1 Ngoma 14.8-17)1.Bukeye imiryango ya Isirayeli yose isanga Dawidi i Heburoni, baravuga bati “Dore turi amagufwa yawe n’umubiri wawe.
2_samweli:5:2: 2.Kandi mu bihe bya kera ubwo Sawuli yari umwami wacu, ni wowe watabazaga Abisirayeli ukabatabarura. Kandi Uwiteka yarakubwiye ati ‘Ni wowe uzagira ubwoko bwanjye bwa Isirayeli’, kandi ati ‘Uzaba umugaba wabo.’ ”
2_samweli:5:3: 3.Nuko abakuru ba Isirayeli bose basanga umwami i Heburoni. Umwami Dawidi asezeranira na bo isezerano imbere y’Uwiteka i Heburoni, bamwimikisha amavuta ngo abe umwami wa Isirayeli.
2_samweli:5:4: 4.Kandi Dawidi yimye amaze imyaka mirongo itatu avutse, amara imyaka mirongo ine ari ku ngoma.
2_samweli:5:5: 5.Yamaze imyaka irindwi n’amezi atandatu i Heburoni, ategeka Abayuda, kandi i Yerusalemu amarayo imyaka mirongo itatu n’itatu ategeka Abisirayeli bose n’Abayuda.
2_samweli:5:6: 6.Hanyuma umwami ahagurukana n’ingabo ze bajya i Yerusalemu, batera Abayebusi b’abaturage b’aho. Bari baracyocyoye Dawidi bati “Nutamaraho impumyi n’ibirema ntuzatugeramo”, kuko bibwiraga ko Dawidi atabasha kuhagera.
2_samweli:5:7: 7.Ariko Dawidi ahindūra igihome gikomeye cya Siyoni, haba ururembo rwa Dawidi bwite.
2_samweli:5:8: 8.Uko ni ko byagenze. Uwo munsi Dawidi aravuga ati “Umuntu wese uzanesha Abayebusi, azajugunye mu rusumo ibyo birema n’impumyi umutima wa Dawidi wanga.” Ni cyo cyatumye bavuga ngo “Nta mpumyi cyangwa ikirema bizinjira mu nzu.”
2_samweli:5:9: 9.Nuko Dawidi aba muri icyo gihome, acyita ururembo rwa Dawidi. Yubaka impande zose, uhereye inyuma ya Milo ukageza imbere y’aho.
2_samweli:5:10: 10.Dawidi akajya arushaho gukomera, kuko Uwiteka Imana Nyiringabo yari kumwe na we.
2_samweli:5:11: 11.Bukeye Hiramu umwami w’i Tiro yohereza intumwa kuri Dawidi, n’ibiti by’imyerezi n’ababaji n’abubatsi b’amabuye, bubakira Dawidi inzu.
2_samweli:5:12: 12.Dawidi amenyeraho ko Uwiteka yamukomeje ngo abe umwami wa Isirayeli, kandi ko ashyize ubwami bwe hejuru ku bw’ubwoko bwe bwa Isirayeli.
2_samweli:5:13: 13.Dawidi amaze kwimuka i Heburoni akajya i Yerusalemu, akomeza kuzana izindi nshoreke n’abandi bagore, kandi yongera kubyara abana b’abahungu n’ab’abakobwa.
2_samweli:5:14: 14.Aya ni yo mazina y’abo yabyariye i Yerusalemu: Shamuwa na Shobabu, na Natani na Salomo,
2_samweli:5:15: 15.na Ibuhari na Elishuwa, na Nefegi na Yafiya,
2_samweli:5:16: 16.na Elishama na Eliyada na Elifeleti.
2_samweli:5:17: Dawidi yongera gutsinda Abafilisitiya17.Bukeye Abafilisitiya bumvise ko Dawidi yimikishijwe amavuta kuba umwami wa Isirayeli, Abafilisitiya bose barazamuka bajya gushaka Dawidi. Dawidi abyumvise, aramanuka ajya mu bihome.
2_samweli:5:18: 18.Abafilisitiya bari baje badendeza mu kibaya cy’Abarafa.
2_samweli:5:19: 19.Maze Dawidi agisha Uwiteka inama ati “Nzamuke ntere Abafilisitiya? Urabatanga ubangabize?” Uwiteka asubiza Dawidi ati “Zamuka kuko ntari bubure kukugabiza Abafilisitiya.”
2_samweli:5:20: 20.Nuko Dawidi ajya i Bāliperasimu, abatsindayo aravuga ati “Uwiteka yahomboreye abanzi banjye imbere yanjye nk’uko amazi ahomboka.” Ni cyo cyatumye ahimba aho hantu Bāliperasimu.
2_samweli:5:21: 21.Maze bahibagirirwa ibishushanyo byabo bisengwa, Dawidi n’abantu be barabijyana.
2_samweli:5:22: 22.Bukeye Abafilisitiya bongera kuzamuka ubwa kabiri, badendeza mu kibaya cy’Abarafa.
2_samweli:5:23: 23.Na bwo Dawidi agisha Uwiteka inama, aramusubiza ati “Nturi buzamuke ahubwo ubace ikubo, ubarasukireho ahateganye n’ishyamba ry’imitugunguru.
2_samweli:5:24: 24.Nuko niwumva ikiriri cy’ingabo gihindira hejuru y’imitugunguru, uhereko uhutireho kuko ubwo Uwiteka ari bube akugiye imbere, gutsinda ingabo z’Abafilisitiya.”
2_samweli:5:25: 25.Nuko Dawidi abigenza atyo nk’uko Uwiteka amutegetse, atsinda Abafilisitiya uhereye i Geba ukageza i Gezeri.
2_samweli:6:1: Dawidi agarura isanduku y’Imana mu rurembo rwe (1 Ngoma 13.1-14; 15.25--16.6, 43)1.Bukeye Dawidi yongera guteranya ingabo zose zatoranijwe muri Isirayeli, abantu inzovu eshatu.
2_samweli:6:2: 2.Dawidi ahagurukana n’abo bantu bose bari kumwe na we, bava i Bāliyuda, bajya kwenda isanduku y’Imana yitirirwa rya Zina, ari ryo zina ry’Uwiteka Nyiringabo wicara ku Bakerubi.
2_samweli:6:3: 3.Nuko bakura isanduku y’Imana kwa Abinadabu ku musozi bayitereka ku igare rishya, maze Uza na Ahiyo bene Abinadabu bacunga iryo gare rishya.
2_samweli:6:4: 4.Nuko barikura mu rugo rwa Abinadabu rwo ku musozi ririho isanduku y’Imana, Ahiyo ayigiye imbere.
2_samweli:6:5: 5.Dawidi n’umuryango wa Isirayeli wose biyerekera imbere y’Uwiteka, bacurangisha ibintu by’imiberoshi by’uburyo bwose, n’inanga na nebelu n’amashako, n’ibinyuguri n’ibyuma bivuga.
2_samweli:6:6: 6.Bageze mu mbuga ihurirwamo ya Nakoni, Uza arambura ukuboko kuramira isanduku y’Imana kuko inka zari zitsikiye.
2_samweli:6:7: 7.Maze uburakari bw’Uwiteka bukongerezwa Uza. Uwiteka amutsindaho amuhoye icyo cyaha cye, agwa aho ngaho iruhande rw’isanduku y’Imana.
2_samweli:6:8: 8.Dawidi ababazwa n’uko Uwiteka asumiye Uza. Ni ko guhimba aho hantu Peresuza na bugingo n’ubu.
2_samweli:6:9: 9.Uwo munsi Dawidi atinya Uwiteka. Nuko aribwira ati “Isanduku y’Uwiteka yaza iwanjye ite?”
2_samweli:6:10: 10.Dawidi yanga gukurayo isanduku y’Uwiteka, ngo ayicyure iwe mu rurembo rwa Dawidi ahubwo ayinyuza hirya ayicyura mu nzu ya Obededomu w’Umunyagati.
2_samweli:6:11: 11.Imara mu nzu ya Obededomu w’Umunyagati amezi atatu, kandi Uwiteka aha umugisha Obededomu n’abo mu rugo rwe bose.
2_samweli:6:12: 12.Bukeye babwira Umwami Dawidi bati “Uwiteka yahaye umugisha Obededomu n’urugo rwe n’ibyo afite byose, ku bw’isanduku y’Imana.” Dawidi aherako arahaguruka ajya gukura isanduku y’Imana kwa Obededomu, ayicyura mu rurembo rwa Dawidi yishīma.
2_samweli:6:13: 13.Nuko byagenze bitya: abahetse isanduku y’Uwiteka batambutse intambwe esheshatu, ahatambira impfizi n’ikimasa cy’umushishe.
2_samweli:6:14: 14.Maze Dawidi yiyerekera imbere y’Uwiteka aca ikibungo, kandi yari yambaye efodi y’igitare.
2_samweli:6:15: 15.Dawidi n’umuryango wa Isirayeli wose bazamura isanduku y’Uwiteka, biyamirira bavuza amakondera.
2_samweli:6:16: 16.Bacyinjiza isanduku y’Uwiteka mu rurembo rwa Dawidi, Mikali mwene Sawuli arungurukira mu idirishya, abona Umwami Dawidi ataraka ahamiririza imbere y’Uwiteka, amugayira mu mutima.
2_samweli:6:17: 17.Nuko binjiza isanduku y’Uwiteka, bayishyira ku gitereko cyayo hagati mu ihema Dawidi yari yarayibambiye. Dawidi aherako atambira imbere y’Uwiteka ibitambo byoswa, n’iby’ishimwe yuko bari amahoro.
2_samweli:6:18: 18.Dawidi amaze gutamba igitambo cyoswa, n’ibitambo by’ishimwe yuko bari amahoro, asabira abantu umugisha mu izina ry’Uwiteka Nyiringabo.
2_samweli:6:19: 19.Maze agaburira abantu bose b’umutwe wose wa Isirayeli, abagabo n’abagore, umuntu wese amuha irobe ry’umutsima n’umugabane w’inyama, n’umubumbe w’inzabibu zumye. Hanyuma abantu bose barataha, umuntu wese ajya iwe.
2_samweli:6:20: 20.Dawidi na we asubira iwe gusabira ab’iwe umugisha. Maze Mikali mwene Sawuli arasohoka gusanganira Dawidi, aramubwira ati “Ariko uyu munsi ko umwami wa Isirayeli yari umupfasoni: ubonye ngo yibeyurire imbere y’abaja b’abagaragu be, nk’umuntu utagira umumaro, iyo yibeyura adafite isoni!”
2_samweli:6:21: 21.Dawidi asubiza Mikali ati “Nabikoreye imbere y’Uwiteka wantoranije, akandutisha so n’urubyaro rwe rwose, akangira umutware w’ubwoko bw’Uwiteka ari bwo Isirayeli. Ni cyo gituma nzajya niyereka imbere y’Uwiteka.
2_samweli:6:22: 22.Kandi ku bwanjye nzarushaho kwigira insuzugurwa no kwicisha bugufi, ariko abo baja uvuze bazanyubaha.”
2_samweli:6:23: 23.Nuko Mikali mwene Sawuli aba ingumba, arinda apfa.
2_samweli:7:1: Imana isezeranya Dawidi kuzakomeza ubwami bwe (1 Ngoma 17.1-15)1.Nuko umwami aba mu rugo rwe, kandi Uwiteka amuha ihumure ku babisha be bamugose bose.
2_samweli:7:2: 2.Bukeye umwami abwira umuhanuzi Natani ati “Dore ubu mba mu nzu yubakishijwe imyerezi, ariko isanduku y’Imana iba mu ihema.”
2_samweli:7:3: 3.Natani asubiza umwami ati “Genda ukore uko umutima wawe ukubwira kose, kuko Uwiteka ari kumwe nawe.”
2_samweli:7:4: 4.Iryo joro ijambo ry’Uwiteka ribonekera Natani riti
2_samweli:7:5: 5.“Genda ubwire umugaragu wanjye Dawidi uti ‘Uko ni ko Uwiteka avuze ngo: Mbese aho uzanyubakira inzu yo kubamo?
2_samweli:7:6: 6.Uhereye igihe nakuriye Abisirayeli muri Egiputa, ntabwo nigeze kuba mu nzu kugeza ubu, ahubwo nagenderaga mu ihema nk’ubuturo.
2_samweli:7:7: 7.Mbese ahantu hose nakagendanye n’Abisirayeli bose, hari ubwo navuganye n’umucamanza wese wa Isirayeli, uwo nategetse kuragira ubwoko bwanjye bwa Isirayeli nti: Ni iki cyababujije kunyubakira inzu yubakishijwe imyerezi?’
2_samweli:7:8: 8.“Nuko umugaragu wanjye Dawidi umubwire utya uti ‘Uko ni ko Uwiteka Nyiringabo avuze ati: Nagukuye mu rugo rw’intama mu bwungeri bwazo, ngo ube umutware w’ubwoko bwanjye bwa Isirayeli.
2_samweli:7:9: 9.Kandi nabanaga nawe aho wajyaga hose, nkarimburira abanzi bawe imbere yawe, kandi nzaguha izina rikomeye nk’amazina y’abakomeye bo mu isi.
2_samweli:7:10: 10.Kandi nzatoraniriza ubwoko bwanjye bwa Isirayeli ahantu, mpabashinge bahature, habe ahabo bwite batazimuka ukundi. Kandi abanyabyaha ntibazongera kubaburabuza nk’ubwa mbere,
2_samweli:7:11: 11.ubwo nategekaga abacamanza gutwara ubwoko bwanjye bwa Isirayeli, kandi nzaguha ihumure ku banzi bawe bose. Ndetse Uwiteka arakubwiye ngo azakuremamo umuryango.
2_samweli:7:12: 12.Kandi iminsi yawe nigera ugasinzirana na ba sogokuruza bawe, nzimika umwana wawe wibyariye akuzungure, kandi nzakomeza ubwami bwe.
2_samweli:7:13: 13.Nuko uwo ni we uzubakira izina ryanjye inzu, kandi nzakomeza intebe y’ubwami bwe iteka ryose.
2_samweli:7:14: 14.Nzamubera se na we azambere umwana: nacumura nzamuhanisha inkoni z’abantu, n’ibyago by’amoko y’abantu,
2_samweli:7:15: 15.kandi imbabazi zanjye ntizizamwomorokaho nk’uko zomorotse kuri Sawuli nagukuye imbere.
2_samweli:7:16: 16.Inzu yawe n’ubwami bwawe bizahoraho bidakuka iminsi yose kandi intebe y’ubwami bwawe izakomera iteka ryose.’ ”
2_samweli:7:17: 17.Nuko ayo magambo yose n’uko kwerekwa kose, Natani abirondorera Dawidi.
2_samweli:7:18: Isengesho Dawidi yasenze Imana (1 Ngoma 17.16-27)18.Umwami Dawidi aherako arinjira, yicara imbere y’Uwiteka aravuga ati “Nkanjye ndi nde Nyagasani Mana, kandi inzu yanjye ni iki, nkanjye ko undinda ukarinda ungeza aha?
2_samweli:7:19: 19.Ariko ibyo kuri wowe ntibikomeye, Nyagasani Mana. None uvuze no ku by’inzu y’umugaragu wawe uko bizamera igihe kirekire kigiye kuza, na byo bibaye nk’itegeko mu bantu, Nyagasani Mana.
2_samweli:7:20: 20.Kandi se, Dawidi yakubwira kindi ki, ko uzi umugaragu wawe Nyagasani Mana.
2_samweli:7:21: 21.Ku bw’ijambo ryawe wakoze ibyo byose bikomeye nk’uko umutima wawe wibwiye, kugira ngo ubimenyeshe umugaragu wawe.
2_samweli:7:22: 22.Ni cyo ubereye ukomeye, Uwiteka Mana, kuko nta wuhwanye nawe, kandi nta yindi mana iriho keretse wowe, nk’ibyo twumvishije amatwi yacu byose.
2_samweli:7:23: 23.Ni irihe shyanga riri mu isi rihwanye n’ubwoko bwawe bwa Isirayeli? Imana yahagurukijwe no kuricungurira kuba ubwoko bwayo kugira ngo yibonere izina, igakora ibikomeye kandi biteye ubwoba ku bwabo no ku bw’igihugu cyawe imbere y’abantu bawe wacunguye, ukabīvanira muri Egiputa, ukabakiza amahanga n’imana zayo?
2_samweli:7:24: 24.Kandi wikomereje ubwoko bwawe bwa Isirayeli kugira ngo bube ubwawe iteka ryose, kandi nawe Uwiteka ubabere Imana yabo.
2_samweli:7:25: 25.“Nuko none Uwiteka Mana, ijambo uvuze ku mugaragu wawe no ku nzu ye urikomeze iminsi yose, kandi uzasohoze ibyo uvuze.
2_samweli:7:26: 26.Maze izina ryawe rihimbazwe iteka ryose, bavuge bati ‘Uwiteka Nyiringabo ni we Mana ya Isirayeli’, kandi inzu y’umugaragu wawe Dawidi izakomezwe imbere yawe.
2_samweli:7:27: 27.Kuko Uwiteka Nyiringabo Mana ya Isirayeli, uhishuriye umugaragu wawe ukavuga ngo uzamwubakira inzu, ni cyo gitumye umugaragu wawe nubahuka mu mutima wanjye kugusenga iri sengesho.
2_samweli:7:28: 28.“None Nyagasani Mana, ni wowe Mana, n’amagambo yawe ni ay’ukuri, kandi usezeranije umugaragu wawe iryo jambo ryiza.
2_samweli:7:29: 29.Nuko none emera guha umugisha inzu y’umugaragu wawe, irame imbere yawe iminsi yose, kuko ari wowe ubivuze Nyagasani Mana, kandi umugisha utanga ujye uba umugisha inzu y’umugaragu wawe ihabwa iteka ryose.”
2_samweli:8:1: Kunesha kwa Dawidi (1 Ngoma 18.1-17)1.Hanyuma y’ibyo Dawidi anesha Abafilisitiya arabacogoza, anyaga urufunguzo rw’umudugudu w’umurwa, arukura mu maboko y’Abafilisitiya.
2_samweli:8:2: 2.Bukeye anesha Abamowabu, maze abarambika hasi mu mirongo abageresha umugozi, inkubwe ebyiri zari iz’abo kwicwa, kandi iya gatatu yose yari iy’abo kurokorwa. Nuko Abamowabu bahinduka abagaragu ba Dawidi, bamuzanira amakoro.
2_samweli:8:3: 3.Bukeye Dawidi anesha Hadadezeri mwene Rehobu umwami w’i Soba, ubwo Hadadezeri yajyaga kugomorera ubwami bwe kuri rwa ruzi.
2_samweli:8:4: 4.Dawidi amutumuraho ingabo ze z’abagendera ku mafarashi igihumbi na magana arindwi, n’abagabo bigenza inzovu ebyiri. Maze Dawidi atemagura ibitsi by’amafarashi akurura amagare, ariko asigaza amafarashi yakwira amagare ijana.
2_samweli:8:5: 5.Bukeye Abasiriya b’i Damasiko baje batabaye Hadadezeri umwami w’i Soba, Dawidi abicamo abantu inzovu ebyiri n’ibihumbi bibiri.
2_samweli:8:6: 6.Maze Dawidi ashyiraho ibihome by’abarinzi b’igihugu cy’i Siriya gitwarwa n’i Damasiko, nuko Abasiriya bahinduka abagaragu ba Dawidi bamuzanira amakoro. Uwiteka yajyaga aneshesha Dawidi aho yajyaga hose.
2_samweli:8:7: 7.Kandi Dawidi yacujije abagaragu ba Hadadezeri ingabo z’izahabu, azijyana i Yerusalemu.
2_samweli:8:8: 8.Kandi Umwami Dawidi akura iminyago y’imiringa myinshi cyane mu midugudu ya Hadadezeri, i Beta n’i Berotayi.
2_samweli:8:9: 9.Bukeye Toyi umwami w’i Hamati yumvise ko Dawidi yatsinze ingabo za Hadadezeri zose,
2_samweli:8:10: 10.atuma umuhungu we Yoramu ku Mwami Dawidi kumuramutsa no kumushimira ko yarwanye na Hadadezeri akamunesha, kuko Hadadezeri yajyaga arwanya Toyi. Maze Yoramu azana ibintu by’ifeza n’iby’izahabu n’iby’imiringa.
2_samweli:8:11: 11.Na byo Umwami Dawidi abyereza Uwiteka hamwe n’ifeza n’izahabu yari yejeje, abikuye mu mahanga yose yanesheje:
2_samweli:8:12: 12.iby’i Siriya n’iby’i Mowabu, n’iby’Abamoni n’iby’Abafilisitiya, n’iby’Abamaleki n’ibyo ku munyago banyaze Hadadezeri mwene Rehobu umwami w’i Soba.
2_samweli:8:13: 13.Dawidi yibonera izina, ubwo yatabarukaga kuneshereza Abasiriya mu kibaya cy’umunyu. Yari yishe abantu inzovu imwe n’ibihumbi munani.
2_samweli:8:14: 14.Nuko ashyiraho ibihome by’abarinzi b’igihugu cya Edomu, abikwiza muri Edomu hose. Abanyedomu bose bahinduka abagaragu ba Dawidi, kandi Uwiteka yajyaga aneshesha Dawidi aho yajyaga hose.
2_samweli:8:15: 15.Nuko Dawidi ategeka Isirayeli yose, acira abantu bose imanza zitabera.
2_samweli:8:16: 16.Kandi Yowabu mwene Seruya ni we wari umugaba w’ingabo ze, na Yehoshafati mwene Ahiludi ni we wari umucurabwenge.
2_samweli:8:17: 17.Kandi Sadoki mwene Ahitubu na Ahimeleki mwene Abiyatari ni bo bari abatambyi, kandi Seraya ni we wari umwanditsi.
2_samweli:8:18: 18.Kandi Benaya mwene Yehoyada ni we watwaraga Abakereti n’Abapeleti, kandi bene Dawidi bari abatware b’intebe.
2_samweli:9:1: Dawidi agirira neza Mefibosheti mwene Yonatani1.Bukeye Dawidi arabaza ati “Mbese hari uwasigaye wo mu muryango wa Sawuli, ngo mugirire neza ku bwa Yonatani?”
2_samweli:9:2: 2.Kandi mu nzu ya Sawuli hariho umugaragu we witwaga Siba, baramuhamagara ngo yitabe Dawidi. Umwami aramubaza ati “Mbese ni wowe Siba?” Na we ati “Ni jye umugaragu wawe.”
2_samweli:9:3: 3.Umwami aramubaza ati “Harya nta wukiriho wo mu nzu ya Sawuli ngo mugirire imbabazi z’Imana?” Siba asubiza umwami ati “Haracyariho umwana wa Yonatani umugaye ibirenge.”
2_samweli:9:4: 4.Umwami aramubaza ati “Aba he?” Siba asubiza umwami ati “Aba mu rugo rwa Makiri mwene Amiyeli i Lodebari.”
2_samweli:9:5: 5.Umwami aramutumira, amukura mu rugo rwa Makiri mwene Amiyeli i Lodebari.
2_samweli:9:6: 6.Nuko Mefibosheti mwene Yonatani mwene Sawuli yitaba Dawidi, ageze imbere ye agwa yubamye aramuramya. Maze Dawidi aravuga ati “Mefibosheti.” Aritaba ati “Karame umugaragu wawe ndi hano.”
2_samweli:9:7: 7.Dawidi aramubwira ati “Humura kuko ntazabura kukugirira neza ku bwa so Yonatani, kandi nzagusubiza imisozi yose y’inyarurembo ya sogokuru Sawuli, kandi uzajya urira ku meza yanjye iminsi yose.”
2_samweli:9:8: 8.Nuko aramuramya aravuga ati “Umugaragu wawe ndi iki ko unyitaho, kandi ndi intumbi y’imbwa?”
2_samweli:9:9: 9.Umwami aherako ahamagara Siba umugaragu wa Sawuli aramubwira ati “Ibyari ibya Sawuli byose n’iby’abo mu nzu ye bose, mbigabiye mwene shobuja.
2_samweli:9:10: 10.Kandi wowe n’abahungu bawe n’abagaragu bawe muzajye mumuhingira imirima ye, usarure imyaka kugira ngo mwene shobuja abone ibimutunga. Ariko Mefibosheti mwene shobuja azajya arira ku meza yanjye iteka.” Kandi Siba yari afite abahungu cumi na batanu n’abagaragu makumyabiri.
2_samweli:9:11: 11.Maze Siba abwira umwami ati “Ibyo umwami databuja yategetse umugaragu we byose, ni ko umugaragu wawe nzabigenza.” Nuko Mefibosheti akajya arira ku meza y’umwami nk’umwana w’umwami wese.
2_samweli:9:12: 12.Kandi Mefibosheti yari afite umwana w’umuhungu muto witwa Mika, n’abo mu rugo rwa Siba bose bari abagaragu ba Mefibosheti.
2_samweli:9:13: 13.Nuko Mefibosheti aguma i Yerusalemu kuko yajyaga arira ku meza y’umwami iteka, kandi yacumbagiraga ibirenge byombi.
2_samweli:10:1: Dawidi anesha Abasiriya (1 Ngoma 19.1-19)1.Hanyuma y’ibyo umwami w’Abamoni aratanga, maze umuhungu we Hanuni yima ingoma ye.
2_samweli:10:2: 2.Dawidi abyumvise aravuga ati “Nzagirira neza Hanuni mwene Nahashi, nk’uko se yangiriye neza.” Nuko Dawidi yohereza abagaragu kumumara umubabaro wa se. Bukeye abagaragu ba Dawidi bajya mu gihugu cy’Abamoni.
2_samweli:10:3: 3.Ariko abatware b’Abamoni babwira umwami wabo Hanuni bati “Mbese ye, ugira ngo Dawidi yubashye so byatuma akoherereza abo kukumara umubabaro? Ntuzi ko Dawidi yakoherereje abagaragu be kwitegereza umudugudu no kuwutata, ngo azabone uburyo bwo kuzawurimbura?”
2_samweli:10:4: 4.Nuko Hanuni afata abo bagaragu ba Dawidi abaharaturaho igice cy’ubwanwa, akeba imyenda yabo hagati ku kibuno, aherako arabohereza.
2_samweli:10:5: 5.Babibwiye Dawidi yohereza abo kubasanganira, kuko bari bakozwe n’isoni cyane. Umwami abatumaho ati “Nimugume i Yeriko kugeza aho muzamarira kumera ubwanwa, muzabone kuza.”
2_samweli:10:6: 6.Abamoni babonye ko bazinuye Dawidi batuma ku Basiriya b’i Betirehobu n’ab’i Soba, barabagurira ngo babahe ingabo zigenza inzovu ebyiri. Umwami w’i Māka na we azane abantu igihumbi, kandi n’ab’i Tobu inzovu imwe n’ibihumbi bibiri.
2_samweli:10:7: 7.Dawidi abyumvise agaba Yowabu n’ingabo z’intwari zose.
2_samweli:10:8: 8.Bukeye Abamoni barasohoka biremera inteko ku karubanda ku irembo, kandi Abasiriya b’i Soba n’ab’i Rehobu, n’abantu b’i Tobu n’aba Māka bari ukwabo ku gasozi.
2_samweli:10:9: 9.Maze Yowabu abonye ko ingamba zimuremeye imbere n’inyuma, atoranya abantu b’intore ba Isirayeli bose, abarema inteko bahangana n’Abasiriya.
2_samweli:10:10: 10.Abandi bantu bose abaha murumuna we Abishayi ngo abe umugaba wabo, abarema inteko bahangana n’Abamoni.
2_samweli:10:11: 11.Aravuga ati “Abasiriya nibaramuka bandushije amaboko uze kumvuna, kandi nawe Abamoni nibaramuka bakurushije amaboko nanjye ndi bukuvune.
2_samweli:10:12: 12.Nuko komera turwane kigabo, turwanire ubwoko bwacu n’imidugudu y’Imana yacu. Kandi Uwiteka abigenze uko ashaka.”
2_samweli:10:13: 13.Yowabu n’abo bari kumwe begera Abasiriya ngo barwane maze baramuhunga.
2_samweli:10:14: 14.Abamoni babonye Abasiriya bahunze na bo bahunga Abishayi, biroha mu mudugudu. Yowabu aherako areka Abamoni asubira i Yerusalemu.
2_samweli:10:15: 15.Bukeye Abasiriya babonye ko baneshejwe n’Abisirayeli, bateranya ingabo zabo.
2_samweli:10:16: 16.Maze Hadarezeri atumira Abasiriya bo hakurya y’uruzi, baza i Helamu bazanye na Shobaki umugaba w’ingabo za Hadarezeri, ari we mugaba wabo.
2_samweli:10:17: 17.Dawidi abimenye na we ateranya Abisirayeli bose, bambuka Yorodani bajya i Helamu. Maze Abasiriya birema inteko bahangana na Dawidi, barwana na we.
2_samweli:10:18: 18.Abasiriya bahunga Abisirayeli, Dawidi yica mu Basiriya abantu barwaniraga ku magare umubare wayo yari magana arindwi, n’abagendera ku mafarashi inzovu enye kandi basogota Shobaki umugaba w’ingabo zabo, bamutsinda aho.
2_samweli:10:19: 19.Nuko abami bose batwarwaga na Hadarezeri, babonye ko baneshejwe n’Abisirayeli barabayoboka barabakorera. Nuko Abasiriya batinya kongera kuvuna Abamoni ukundi.
2_samweli:11:1: Icyaha cya Dawidi1.Nuko umwaka utashye mu gihe abami batabariraga, Dawidi atuma Yowabu n’abagaragu be n’Abisirayeli bose, barimbura Abamoni kandi bagota n’i Raba. Ariko Dawidi we yisigariye i Yerusalemu.
2_samweli:11:2: 2.Bukeye nimugoroba Dawidi yibambuye ku gisasiro cye, aza agendagenda hejuru y’inzu y’umwami. Maze ahagaze hejuru aho abona umugore wiyuhagira, yari umugore mwiza w’ikibengukiro.
2_samweli:11:3: 3.Dawidi amubonye atuma kubaririza uwo mugore uwo ari we. Maze umuntu aramubwira ati “Si Batisheba mwene Eliyamu umugore wa Uriya w’Umuheti?”
2_samweli:11:4: 4.Nuko Dawidi yohereza intumwa ziramuzana aza iwe, bararyamana (kuko yari yitunganije akize imyanda), maze asubira iwe.
2_samweli:11:5: 5.Bukeye arasama, atuma kuri Dawidi ati “Ndatwite.”
2_samweli:11:6: 6.Hanyuma Dawidi atuma kuri Yowabu ati “Nyoherereza Uriya w’Umuheti.” Nuko Yowabu yohereza Uriya kuri Dawidi.
2_samweli:11:7: 7.Uriya ageze kwa Dawidi, Dawidi amubaza uko Yowabu n’ingabo bameze, amubaza n’amakuru yo mu ntambara.
2_samweli:11:8: 8.Maze Dawidi aramubwira ati “Manuka ujye iwawe woge ibirenge.” Nuko Uriya ava ibwami, maze bamukurikiza igaburo rivuye ku mwami.
2_samweli:11:9: 9.Ariko Uriya yiraranira n’abagaragu ba shebuja bose barāririye ku muryango wa kambere y’ibwami, ntiyamanuka ngo ajye iwe.
2_samweli:11:10: 10.Babwiye Dawidi ko Uriya atagiye iwe, Dawidi ni ko kubaza Uriya ati “Mbese ntuvuye ku rugendo? Ni iki cyakubujije kujya iwawe?”
2_samweli:11:11: 11.Uriya asubiza Dawidi ati “Isanduku y’Imana n’Abisirayeli n’Abayuda barara mu ngando, kandi databuja Yowabu n’abagaragu ba databuja bagerereje ku gasozi, naho jye nigire iwanjye, njye kurya no kunywa, niryamanire n’umugore wanjye? Oya ndahiye ubugingo bwawe uko uramye, sinakora bene ibyo.”
2_samweli:11:12: 12.Dawidi abwira Uriya ati “Sibira hano uyu munsi, ejo nzabone kugusezerera.” Nuko Uriya asibira i Yerusalemu uwo munsi na bukeye.
2_samweli:11:13: 13.Dawidi aramuhamagara, ararya aranywa amuri imbere, aramusindisha, maze nijoro arasohoka ajya kwiryamira ku buriri bwe hamwe n’abagaragu ba shebuja, ntiyarushya atarabukira iwe.
2_samweli:11:14: 14.Bukeye bwaho mu gitondo Dawidi yandikira Yowabu urwandiko, ararumwoherereza aruhaye Uriya.
2_samweli:11:15: 15.Yandika muri urwo rwandiko atya ati “Mushyire Uriya imbere aho urugamba rukomeye cyane, maze mumuhāne, bamutere apfe.”
2_samweli:11:16: 16.Nuko Yowabu amaze kwitegereza umudugudu, ashyira Uriya aho yari azi ko intwari ziri.
2_samweli:11:17: 17.Maze bene umudugudu barasohoka barwana na Yowabu. Nuko mu bagaragu ba Dawidi hapfamo bamwe, kandi na Uriya w’Umuheti na we arapfa.
2_samweli:11:18: 18.Yowabu yohereza intumwa kubwira Dawidi amacumu,
2_samweli:11:19: 19.yihanangiriza iyo ntumwa ati “Numara kubarira umwami amacumu,
2_samweli:11:20: 20.umwami akarakara akakubaza ati ‘Ni iki cyatumye mugomba kwegera umudugudu mutyo murwana? Mbese ntimwari muzi ko babasha kubarasa bahagaze ku nkike?’
2_samweli:11:21: 21.Akongera kukubwira ati ‘Harya ni nde wishe Abimeleki mwene Yerubasheti? Si umugore wamuteye ingasire yihagarariye ku nkike, akamutsinda i Tebesa? Ni iki cyatumye mwegera inkike mutyo?’ Nuko uzamusubize uti ‘Erega n’umugaragu wawe Uriya w’Umuheti na we yarapfuye.’ ”
2_samweli:11:22: 22.Nuko intumwa iragenda, igeze kuri Dawidi imusobanurira ibyo Yowabu yamutumye byose.
2_samweli:11:23: 23.Ibwira Dawidi iti “Abantu baho baradutwaje, baduhubukanye aho twari turi ku gasozi, dusakirana na bo turinda tugera mu muharuro w’irembo ryabo.
2_samweli:11:24: 24.Nuko abarashi bari bahagaze ku nkike barasa abagaragu bawe, none abagaragu b’umwami bamwe barapfuye, kandi n’umugaragu wawe Uriya w’Umuheti na we yarapfuye.”
2_samweli:11:25: 25.Maze Dawidi abwira iyo ntumwa ati “Uzabwire Yowabu utya uti ‘Ibyo ntibikubabaze, kuko inkota yica umuntu irindiriye undi. Urusheho gukomeza urugamba, urwane n’umudugudu uwutsinde.’ Kandi nawe umurindishe.”
2_samweli:11:26: 26.Bukeye muka Uriya yumvise ko umugabo we yapfuye, aramwiraburira.
2_samweli:11:27: 27.Nuko hanyuma yo kumwerera, Dawidi aramutumira amushyira iwe, amugira umugore we. Bukeye babyarana umwana w’umuhungu, ariko icyo Dawidi yakoze icyo cyarakaje Uwiteka.
2_samweli:12:1: Umugani wa Natani1.Bukeye Uwiteka atuma Natani kuri Dawidi, ageze iwe aramubwira ati “Habayeho abantu babiri mu mudugudu umwe, umwe yari umutunzi, undi yari umukene.
2_samweli:12:2: 2.Kandi uwo mutunzi yari afite amashyo y’inka n’intama nyinshi cyane.
2_samweli:12:3: 3.Ariko uwo mukene we nta cyo yari afite keretse akāgazi k’intama yari yaguze akakarera, kagakurana n’abana be bo mu rugo, kakarya ku twokurya twe, kakanywera ku nkongoro ye kandi karyamaga mu gituza cye, kaba nk’umukobwa we.
2_samweli:12:4: 4.Bukeye haza umugenzi kwa wa mutunzi, umubi ni uwenda mu nka ze cyangwa mu ntama ze ngo azimanire uwo mushyitsi wamugendereye, ahubwo ajya kwenda wa mwagazi w’intama wa wa mukene, awuzimanira umushyitsi we.”
2_samweli:12:5: 5.Maze Dawidi aherako arakarira uwo mugabo cyane. Ni ko kubwira Natani ati “Ndahiye Uwiteka uhoraho, umuntu wakoze bene ibyo akwiriye gupfa.
2_samweli:12:6: 6.Kandi azarihe umwana w’intama kane, kuko yakoze ibimeze bityo kandi kuko atagira impuhwe.”
2_samweli:12:7: 7.Nuko Natani abwira Dawidi ati “Erega uwo mugabo ni wowe! Uku ni ko Uwiteka Imana ya Isirayeli ivuze itya iti ‘Nakwimikishije amavuta ngo ube umwami wa Isirayeli, ngukiza amaboko ya Sawuli
2_samweli:12:8: 8.nguha inzu ya shobuja, nguha n’abagore be baragusegura, kandi nkugabira umuryango wa Isirayeli n’uwa Yuda. Kandi iyo biba byarabaye bike, mba narakongereyeho ibindi.
2_samweli:12:9: 9.Ni iki cyatumye usuzugura ijambo ry’Uwiteka, ugahangara gukora ibyangwa na we: wicishije Uriya w’Umuheti inkota kandi ugacyura umugore we, umugira uwawe, kandi Uriya umwicisha inkota y’Abamoni.
2_samweli:12:10: 10.Nuko rero inkota ntabwo izava mu rugo rwawe iteka ryose, kuko wansuzuguye ugacyura umugore wa Uriya w’Umuheti, ukamugira uwawe.’
2_samweli:12:11: 11.Nuko Uwiteka avuze atya ati ‘Umva nzaguhagurukiriza ibyago bivuye mu rugo rwawe, kandi nzatwara abagore bawe ureba mbahe umuturanyi wawe, aryamanire na bo ku itangaze ry’izuba.
2_samweli:12:12: 12.Wowe wabikoreye mu rwihisho, ariko jye nzabikorera imbere y’Abisirayeli bose ku mugaragaro izuba riva.’ ”
2_samweli:12:13: 13.Nuko Dawidi abwira Natani ati “Nacumuye ku Uwiteka.” Natani abwira Dawidi ati “Nuko rero Uwiteka yagukuyeho icyaha cyawe, nturi bupfe.
2_samweli:12:14: 14.Ariko kuko wahaye abanzi b’Uwiteka urwitwazo runini rwo kumutuka ku bw’icyo wakoze icyo, umwana uzavuka ntazabura gupfa.”
2_samweli:12:15: 15.Natani aherako asubira iwe.
2_samweli:12:16: Dawidi asabira umwana ntibyamubuza gupfa Hanyuma Uwiteka atera umwana muka Uriya yabyaranye na Dawidi, araremba cyane.16.Ni cyo cyatumye Dawidi yingingira uwo mwana ku Mana, yiyiriza ubusa yihina mu nzu, acura umurambo hasi burinda bucya.
2_samweli:12:17: 17.Abantu bakuru bo mu rugo rwe babibonye barahaguruka, bamuhagarara iruhande ngo bamubyutse ave hasi, aranga kandi yanga no gusangira na bo.
2_samweli:12:18: 18.Maze ku munsi wa karindwi umwana arapfa. Abagaragu ba Dawidi batinya kumubwira ko umwana yapfuye, kuko bibwiye bati “Mbese ubwo twavuganaga na we umwana akiri muzima ntatwumve, biracura iki nitumubwira ko umwana apfuye? Ntari burusheho kwiyica nabi?”
2_samweli:12:19: 19.Maze Dawidi abonye ko abagaragu be bongorerana, amenyera aho ko umwana apfuye. Abaza abagaragu be ati “Mbese umwana arapfuye?” Baramusubiza bati “Arapfuye.”
2_samweli:12:20: 20.Nuko Dawidi arabyuka ariyuhagira arihezura, yambara indi myambaro, aherako ajya mu nzu y’Uwiteka arasenga, avayo ajya mu nzu ye. Nuko aho ashakiye bamuzanira ibyokurya, ararya.
2_samweli:12:21: 21.Maze abagaragu be baramubaza bati “Ibyo ugize ibyo ni ibiki? Wiyirije ubusa uririra umwana akiri muzima, ariko none umwana amaze gupfa urahaguruka ujya kurya.”
2_samweli:12:22: 22.Arabasubiza ati “Umwana akiri muzima niyirije ubusa ndira kuko nibwiraga nti ‘Nta wubizi, ahari Uwiteka yangirira imbabazi agakiza uwo mwana.’
2_samweli:12:23: 23.Ariko none amaze gupfa, ndiyiririza iki ubusa? Mbese nabasha kumugarura? Nzajya aho ari ariko we ntabwo azagaruka aho ndi.”
2_samweli:12:24: 24.Maze Dawidi ahumuriza umugore we Batisheba, ataha iwe bararyamana. Bukeye babyarana umwana w’umuhungu amwita Salomo, Uwiteka aramukunda
2_samweli:12:25: 25.atuma umuhanuzi Natani amumwitira Yedidiya, ku bw’Uwiteka.
2_samweli:12:26: Dawidi atsinda i Raba (1 Ngoma 20.1-3)26.Bukeye Yowabu atera i Raba y’Abamoni, atsinda ururembo rwabo.
2_samweli:12:27: 27.Aherako atuma intumwa kuri Dawidi atya ati “Narwanye n’ab’i Raba, kandi nahindūye umudugudu w’amazi.
2_samweli:12:28: 28.None teranya abantu basigaye aho, uze ugerereze imbere y’umudugudu uwutere, uwuhindūre ne kuba ari jye uwuhindūra, bakawunyitirira.”
2_samweli:12:29: 29.Nuko Dawidi ateranya ingabo zose arahaguruka atera i Raba, arwana n’abaho arahahindūra.
2_samweli:12:30: 30.Yambura umwami wabo ikamba ku mutwe, kuremēra kwaryo kwari italanto y’izahabu, kandi muri ryo harimo amabuye y’igiciro cyinshi. Nuko baritegesha Dawidi ku mutwe, maze muri uwo mudugudu anyagayo iminyago myinshi cyane.
2_samweli:12:31: 31.Akuramo abantu baho abakereza inkero n’ibyuma biharura n’intorezo z’ibyuma, kandi abanyuza mu itanura ry’amatafari. Uko ni ko yagenzaga imidugudu yose y’Abamoni. Nuko Dawidi n’ingabo ze zose basubira i Yerusalemu.
2_samweli:13:1: Amunoni akinda Tamari1.Kandi Abusalomu mwene Dawidi yari afite mushiki we mwiza witwaga Tamari. Bukeye Amunoni mwene Dawidi aramubenguka.
2_samweli:13:2: 2.Amunoni ahagarika umutima ku bwa mushiki we Tamari bituma arwara, kuko yari umwari kandi abona ko bimukomereye kugira icyo yamukoraho.
2_samweli:13:3: 3.Amunoni yari afite incuti ye yitwaga Yonadabu mwene Shimeya mukuru wa Dawidi, kandi Yonadabu uwo yari umugabo w’ingurumbanya cyane.
2_samweli:13:4: 4.Aramubaza ati “Wa mwana w’umwami we, ni iki gihora kikunanura uko bukeye? Ntiwabimbwira?” Amunoni aramusubiza ati “Umva nabengutse Tamari mushiki wa mwene data Abusalomu.”
2_samweli:13:5: 5.Yonadabu aramubwira ati “Iryamire ku buriri bwawe wirwaze, maze so naza kukureba umubwire uti ‘Ndakwinginze, reka mushiki wanjye Tamari aze ampe icyo ndya, antekere ibyokurya hano imbere yanjye kugira ngo mbirebe, mbirīre mu ntoki ze.’ ”
2_samweli:13:6: 6.Nuko Amunoni araryama arirwaza. Maze umwami aje kumureba, Amunoni aramubwira ati “Ndakwinginze, mushiki wanjye Tamari naze antekere udutsima tubiri imbere yanjye, nturīre mu ntoki ze.”
2_samweli:13:7: 7.Nuko Dawidi atuma mu rugo kuri Tamari ati “Ubu ngubu jya kwa musaza wawe Amunoni, umutekere ibyokurya.”
2_samweli:13:8: 8.Nuko Tamari ajya kwa musaza we Amunoni asanga araryamye, yenda urwanga arubumbiramo udutsima imbere ye, aratwotsa.
2_samweli:13:9: 9.Asingira urukraangiro ayimushyira imbere yanga kurya, maze Amunoni aravuga ati “Abagabo bose nibīheze.” Umugabo wese arīheza.
2_samweli:13:10: 10.Nuko Amunoni abwira Tamari ati “Nzanira ibyokurya ku murere ndīre mu ntoki zawe.” Nuko Tamari yenda utwo dutsima ahishije, adushyira musaza we Amunoni ku murere.
2_samweli:13:11: 11.Ayimuhereje ngo arye aramufata, aramubwira ati “Ngwino turyamane, mwene data.”
2_samweli:13:12: 12.Na we aramusubiza ati “Oya mwene data, winkoza isoni kuko bene ibyo bidakwiriye gukorwa muri Isirayeli, we gukora iby’ubupfu nk’ibi.
2_samweli:13:13: 13.Mbese nkanjye izo soni nazicana he? Kandi nawe waba ubaye igicucu muri Isirayeli. None ndakwinginze, ubivugane n’umwami kuko atazakunyima.”
2_samweli:13:14: 14.Ariko yanga kumwumvira. Maze kuko yamurushije amaboko, aramuhata aryamana na we.
2_samweli:13:15: 15.Maze hanyuma Amunoni amwanga urunuka rutagira akagero, urwango yamwanze rwaruse ubwinshi urukundo yari amukunze. Amunoni aramubwira ati “Haguruka ugende.”
2_samweli:13:16: 16.Na we aramusubiza ati “Reka kuko iki cyaha ukora unyirukana gikomeye kuruta icyo wankoreye.” Ariko yanga kumwumva.
2_samweli:13:17: 17.Maze ahamagara umunyagikari we aramubwira ati “Sohora uyu mukobwa amvire mu nzu, maze umukingiranire hanze.”
2_samweli:13:18: 18.Kandi yari yambaye umwambaro w’amabara menshi, kuko ari ko abakobwa b’umwami b’abari bajyaga bambara. Nuko umugaragu we aramusohora, aramukingirana.
2_samweli:13:19: 19.Maze Tamari yiyorera ivu mu mutwe, ashishimura umwambaro we w’amabara menshi yari yambaye, yikorera ukuboko, agenda arira umugenda aboroga.
2_samweli:13:20: 20.Musaza we Abusalomu amubonye aramubaza ati “Mbega wahuye na musaza wawe Amunoni? Nuko ihorere mwene mama, ni musaza wawe we gushengurwa umutima n’ibyo.” Nuko Tamari aguma kwa musaza we Abusalomu nk’umwage.
2_samweli:13:21: 21.Maze Umwami Dawidi yumvise ibyo byose ararakara cyane.
2_samweli:13:22: 22.Kandi Abusalomu ntiyaba akivugana na Amunoni ibibi cyangwa ibyiza, kuko Abusalomu yari yanze Amunoni, ubwo yakojeje isoni mushiki we Tamari.
2_samweli:13:23: Abusalomu ahōra Amunoni ibya mushiki we, aramwica23.Hashize imyaka ibiri, Abusalomu ashaka abo gukemura ubwoya bw’intama ze i Bālihasori, hateganye n’i Bwefurayimu: Abusalomu ararika abana b’umwami bose.
2_samweli:13:24: 24.Bukeye ajya ibwami abwira umwami ati “Ubu umugaragu wawe mbonye abo gukemura ubwoya bw’intama zanjye. Ndakwinginze, nyagasani, jyana n’umugaragu wawe hamwe n’abagaragu bawe.”
2_samweli:13:25: 25.Umwami abwira Abusalomu ati “Oya mwana wanjye, nta kitujyana twese tutakurushya.” Abusalomu aramuhata ariko yanga kugenda, ahubwo amusabira umugisha.
2_samweli:13:26: 26.Abusalomu aramubwira ati “Nuko rero nutaza, ndakwinginze ohereza mukuru wanjye Amunoni, abe ari we tujyana.” Umwami aramusubiza ati “Ni iki gituma ushaka ko mujyana?”
2_samweli:13:27: 27.Ariko Abusalomu aramuhata, kugira ngo yemerere Amunoni n’abandi bana b’umwami bose ngo bajyane na we.
2_samweli:13:28: 28.Bagezeyo Abusalomu ategeka abagaragu be ati “Mwitegereze, nimubona vino inejeje umutima wa Amunoni nkababwira nti ‘Nimutikure Amunoni’, nuko mumwice ntimutinye. Mbese si jye ubategetse? Nimukomere mube intwari.”
2_samweli:13:29: 29.Nuko abagaragu ba Abusalomu bagenza Amunoni nk’uko Abusalomu yabategetse. Maze abana b’umwami bose baherako barahaguruka, umuntu wese yinagurira ku nyumbu ye barahunga.
2_samweli:13:30: 30.Bakiri mu nzira, imbitsi ibikira Dawidi iti “Abusalomu yishe abana b’umwami bose, ntihasigaye n’umwe muri bo.”
2_samweli:13:31: 31.Maze umwami arabaduka ashishimura imyambaro ye, acura umurambo hasi, n’abagaragu be bose bamuhagarara iruhande, bashishimura imyambaro yabo.
2_samweli:13:32: 32.Ariko Yonadabu mwene Shimeya, mukuru wa Dawidi aravuga ati “Nyagasani, ntugire ngo bishe abana b’umwami bose, ahubwo hapfuye Amunoni wenyine. Icyakora byategetswe na Abusalomu, kuko yabigambiriye uhereye umunsi Amunoni yakoreje isoni mushiki we Tamari.
2_samweli:13:33: 33.Nuko none Mwami Nyagasani, iryo jambo rye kugukura umutima wibwira ko abana b’umwami bose bapfuye, ahubwo hapfuye Amunoni wenyine.”
2_samweli:13:34: 34.Nuko Abusalomu arahunga. Maze umuhungu wari urinze atereye amaso, abona abantu benshi badutse baturutse mu nzira yo mu ibanga ry’umusozi inyuma.
2_samweli:13:35: 35.Yonadabu abwira umwami ati “Ngabo abana b’umwami barasohoye, nk’uko umugaragu wawe mvuze ni ko bibaye.”
2_samweli:13:36: 36.Amaze kuvuga atyo, uwo mwanya abana b’umwami basesekara aho. Bakihagera batera hejuru bararira, kandi n’umwami n’abagaragu be bose bararira cyane.
2_samweli:13:37: 37.Abusalomu we arahunga, ajya kwa Talumayi mwene Amihuri umwami w’i Geshuri. Nuko Dawidi akajya aririra umwana we uko bukeye.
2_samweli:13:38: 38.Abusalomu ahungira i Geshuri amarayo imyaka itatu.
2_samweli:13:39: 39.Hanyuma Umwami Dawidi agirira Abusalomu urukumbuzi rwo kujya kumusura, kuko yari amaze gushira umubabaro wa Amunoni ko yapfuye.
2_samweli:14:1: Abusalomu yiyunga na Dawidi1.Bukeye Yowabu mwene Seruya amenya ko umwami akumbuye Abusalomu.
2_samweli:14:2: 2.Yowabu aherako atuma intumwa i Tekowa, avanayo umugore w’umunyabwenge aramubwira ati “Ndakwinginze ihindure nk’uwirabuye, wambare umwambaro w’ubwirabure kandi we kwihezura, ahubwo use n’umugore umaze igihe kirekire wiraburiye ba nyakwigendera.
2_samweli:14:3: 3.Maze ujye ibwami, uku abe ari ko ubwira umwami.” Yowabu aherako amubwira ibyo ari buvuge.
2_samweli:14:4: 4.Nuko uwo mugore w’i Tekowa agitangira kuvugana n’umwami yikubita hasi yubamye, aramuramya aravuga ati “Ntabara nyagasani.”
2_samweli:14:5: 5.Umwami aramubaza ati “Ubaye ute?” Aramusubiza ati “Ndi umupfakazi rwose, umugabo wanjye yarapfuye.
2_samweli:14:6: 6.Kandi umuja wawe nari mfite abana b’abahungu babiri, bukeye bombi bajya ku gasozi barwanirayo, kandi nta wari uhari wo kubakiza. Nuko umwe asogota undi, aramwica.
2_samweli:14:7: 7.None sinakubwira, umuryango wose uhagurukiye umuja wawe kandi bariho baravuga ngo, nintange gatozi bamuhōra mwene se yishe. Nguko uko bagiye kurimbura umuragwa na we, uko ni ko bashaka kuzimya ikara nsigaranye, ngo badasigira umugabo wanjye izina cyangwa umwuzukuru ku isi.”
2_samweli:14:8: 8.Umwami abwira uwo mugore ati “Hoshi subira iwawe, ndi butegeke ibyawe.”
2_samweli:14:9: 9.Uwo mugore w’i Tekowa abwira umwami ati “Mwami nyagasani, icyaha kibe kuri jye no ku nzu ya data, umwami ye kugibwaho n’urubanza, ndetse n’ingoma ye.”
2_samweli:14:10: 10.Umwami aravuga ati “Nihagira ukubwira ijambo ryose umunzanire, ntazagusubiraho ukundi.”
2_samweli:14:11: 11.Umugore aherako aramubwira ati “Ndakwinginze nyagasani, ibuka Uwiteka Imana yawe kugira ngo umuhōzi atazongera kurimbura ukundi, bakica umuhungu nsigaranye.” Umwami aramusubiza ati “Ndahiye Uwiteka uhoraho, nta gasatsi na kamwe k’umuhungu wawe kazagwa hasi.”
2_samweli:14:12: 12.Uwo mugore aravuga ati “Ndakwinginze, umuja wawe ngire icyo mbwira umwami databuja.” Ati “Ngaho mbwira.”
2_samweli:14:13: 13.Umugore aravuga ati “Ni iki cyatumye urundurira iyo nama ku bantu b’Imana? Kuko umwami niba avuze iryo jambo asa n’utsinzwe n’urubanza, kuko umwami atagaruye umuntu we yirukanye.
2_samweli:14:14: 14.Twese tuzapfa duse n’amazi amenetse hasi, atakiyorwa ukundi. Kandi Imana na yo ubwayo ntihutiraho gukuraho ubugingo, ahubwo ishaka uburyo kugira ngo uwirukanywe ataba uciwe na yo.
2_samweli:14:15: 15.Nuko none nzanywe no kukubwira iryo jambo, kandi igitumye nza mbitewe n’uko abantu banteye ubwoba, umuja wawe ni ko kugira nti ‘Ngiye kwivuganira n’umwami, ahari umwami yakwemera gukora icyo umuja we amusabye.
2_samweli:14:16: 16.Umwami ari bwumvire umuja we, amukize uwo mugabo washatse kundimburana n’umwana wanjye, kugira ngo atuvane muri gakondo y’Imana.’
2_samweli:14:17: 17.Nuko umuja wawe ndavuga nti ‘Ndakwinginze, ijambo umwami databuja ari buvuge ribe iryo kumpumuriza, kuko Mwami nyagasani, umeze nka marayika w’Imana guhitamo ibibi n’ibyiza. Nuko Uwiteka Imana yawe igumane nawe.’ ”
2_samweli:14:18: 18.Maze umwami asubiza uwo mugore ati “Ndakwinginze, ntumpishe ijambo ryose nkubaza.” Umugore aramusubiza ati “Umwami databuja narivuge.”
2_samweli:14:19: 19.Umwami aramubaza ati “Mbese ufatanije na Yowabu muri ibyo byose?” Umugore aramusubiza ati “Ndahiye ubugingo bwawe Mwami nyagasani, ntawabasha gukebereza iburyo cyangwa ibumoso, kugira ngo ave ku ijambo ryose umwami databuja avuze. Koko umugaragu wawe Yowabu ni we wategetse umuja wawe, kandi ni we wambwiye ayo magambo yose,
2_samweli:14:20: 20.kugira ngo bihinduke ukundi. Ni cyo cyatumye umugaragu wawe Yowabu agenza atyo. Kandi databuja ni umunyabwenge bumeze nk’ubwa marayika w’Imana, akamenya ibiri mu isi byose.”
2_samweli:14:21: 21.Hanyuma umwami abwira Yowabu ati “Umva ye, ayo magambo ndayarangije. Nuko genda ugarure uwo muhungu Abusalomu.”
2_samweli:14:22: 22.Yowabu yikubita hasi yubamye imbere y’umwami aramuramya, aramushima. Yowabu aravuga ati “Ubu umugaragu wawe menye ko ngutonnyeho Mwami nyagasani, kuko wakoreye umugaragu wawe icyo ngusabye.”
2_samweli:14:23: 23.Yowabu aherako arahaguruka ajya i Geshuri, azana Abusalomu i Yerusalemu.
2_samweli:14:24: 24.Maze umwami aravuga ati “Nasubire mu rugo rwe, ariko ntazanca iryera.” Nuko Abusalomu asubira mu rugo rwe, ntiyabonana n’umwami.
2_samweli:14:25: 25.Kandi mu Bisirayeli bose, ntawashimwaga nka Abusalomu ku bw’ubwiza bwe, uhereye mu bworo bw’ikirenge ukageza mu gihorihori nta nenge yamubonekagaho.
2_samweli:14:26: 26.Uko umwaka utashye yikemuzaga umusatsi kuko wamuremereraga, ni cyo cyatumaga awukemuza. Kandi iyo yawukemuzaga yarawugeraga, ukaba shekeli magana abiri ukurikije urugero rw’umwami.
2_samweli:14:27: 27.Kandi Abusalomu abyara abana b’abahungu batatu n’umukobwa witwaga Tamari, yari umukobwa w’uburanga.
2_samweli:14:28: 28.Nuko Abusalomu amara imyaka ibiri i Yerusalemu, adaca iryera umwami.
2_samweli:14:29: 29.Bukeye Abusalomu atumira Yowabu ngo amutume ku mwami, yanga kumwitaba. Yongera kumutumira ubwa kabiri na bwo yanga kumwitaba.
2_samweli:14:30: 30.Ni cyo cyatumye abwira abagaragu be ati “Umva, umurima wa Yowabu uhereranye n’uwanjye kandi afitemo sayiri, nimugende muzitwike.” Nuko abagaragu ba Abusalomu baragenda barazikongeza.
2_samweli:14:31: 31.Yowabu arahaguruka ajya kwa Abusalomu aramubaza ati “Ni iki cyatumye abagaragu bawe bantwikira umurima?”
2_samweli:14:32: 32.Abusalomu asubiza Yowabu ati “Ni uko nagutumiye ngo wende hano ngutume ku mwami, ngo umumbarize uti ‘Nazanywe n’iki cyamvanye i Geshuri? Icyandutiraho ni uko mba narigumiyeyo kugeza ubu.’ Nuko reka mbonane n’umwami. Niba hariho gukiranirwa muri jye, anyice.”
2_samweli:14:33: 33.Nuko Yowabu ajya ibwam, abibwira umwami, maze umwami atumira Abusalomu, aramwitaba. Ageze imbere y’umwami yikubita hasi yubamye, umwami aramusoma.
2_samweli:15:1: Abusalomu agandisha abantu1.Hanyuma y’ibyo, Abusalomu yitunganiriza igare n’amafarashi n’abagabo mirongo itanu bo kumwiruka imbere.
2_samweli:15:2: 2.Kandi Abusalomu yajyaga azinduka kare, agahagarara iruhande rw’irembo ku karubanda, maze umuntu wese iyo yabaga afite urubanza rukwiriye kuburanirwa ku mwami, Abusalomu yaramuhamagaraga akamubwira ati “Uri uwo mu wuhe mudugudu?” Na we ati “Umugaragu wawe ndi uwo mu muryango naka wa Isirayeli.”
2_samweli:15:3: 3.Abusalomu akamubwira ati “Umva, urubanza rwawe ni rwiza kandi ruraboneye, ariko nta muntu umwami yashyizeho kumva ibyawe.”
2_samweli:15:4: 4.Kandi Abusalomu akongera ati “Yemwe, iyaba naragizwe umucamanza wo muri iki gihugu, umuntu wese wagize impamvu yose cyangwa urubanza akansanga, namuciriye urubanza rutabera.”
2_samweli:15:5: 5.Iyo hagiraga umuntu umwegera kumuramya, yaramburaga ukuboko kwe akamufata, akamusoma.
2_samweli:15:6: 6.Uko ni ko Abusalomu yagenzaga Abisirayeli bazaga kuburanira umwami bose. Nuko Abusalomu yigarurira imitima y’Abisirayeli.
2_samweli:15:7: 7.Hashize imyaka ine, Abusalomu abwira umwami ati “Ndakwinginze, nyemerera njye guhigura umuhigo nahigiye Uwiteka i Heburoni.
2_samweli:15:8: 8.Kuko umugaragu wawe nahize umuhigo ubwo nari ntuye i Geshuri muri Siriya, naravuze nti ‘Uwiteka naramuka anshubije i Yerusalemu, ni koko nzakorera Uwiteka.’ ”
2_samweli:15:9: 9.Umwami aramusubiza ati “Genda amahoro.” Nuko arahaguruka ajya i Heburoni.
2_samweli:15:10: 10.Bukeye Abusalomu yohereza abatasi mu miryango ya Isirayeli yose kwamamazayo ubutumwa ngo “Nimwumva ijwi ry’ikondera muzahereko muvuge muti ‘Abusalomu yimye i Heburoni.’ ”
2_samweli:15:11: 11.Kandi muri iryo genda rya Abusalomu, yajyanye n’abagabo magana abiri avanye i Yerusalemu bahamagawe kugenda, bagenda batagira uburiganya, nta cyo bazi.
2_samweli:15:12: 12.Maze Abusalomu atumira Ahitofeli w’i Gilo umujyanama wa Dawidi, ava mu mudugudu w’iwabo i Gilo mu gihe Abusalomu yatambaga ibitambo. Nuko ubugome buragwira, kuko abantu biyongeraga kubana na Abusalomu uko bukeye.
2_samweli:15:13: Guhunga kwa Dawidi13.Bukeye haza intumwa kuri Dawidi ivuga iti “Imitima y’Abisirayeli ikurikiye Abusalomu.”
2_samweli:15:14: 14.Nuko Dawidi abwira abagaragu be bose bari kumwe na we i Yerusalemu ati “Nimuhaguruke duhunge, nitudahunga nta n’umwe muri twe uri burokoke Abusalomu. Mubanguke kugenda atadufata vuba akatugirira nabi, bigatuma arimbuza umurwa inkota.”
2_samweli:15:15: 15.Abagaragu b’umwami baramusubiza bati “Abagaragu bawe twiteguye gukora icyo umwami databuja ashaka cyose.”
2_samweli:15:16: 16.Nuko umwami asohokana n’abo mu rugo rwe bose bamukurikiye ariko umwami asigayo abagore cumi b’inshoreke ze bo kurinda urugo.
2_samweli:15:17: 17.Umwami arasohoka abantu bose baramukurikira, bagera i Betimeruhaki batindayo.
2_samweli:15:18: 18.Nuko abagaragu be bose baramushagara kandi Abakereti bose n’Abapeleti bose n’Abagiti bose uko ari magana atandatu, abari bavuye i Gati bamukurikiye, banyura imbere y’umwami.
2_samweli:15:19: 19.Maze umwami abaza Itayi w’Umugiti ati “Wowe ni iki gitumye ujyana natwe? Subirayo ugumane n’umwami kuko uri umunyamahanga waje uciwe, subira iwawe.
2_samweli:15:20: 20.Mbese ko waje ejo, none nabasha nte kukubwira ngo uzererane natwe hirya no hino, ubwo ngiye kujya aho mbonye hose? Subirayo, usubiraneyo na bene so. Imbabazi n’ukuri bibane nawe.”
2_samweli:15:21: 21.Itayi asubiza umwami ati “Ndahiye Uwiteka uhoraho n’ubugingo bw’umwami databuja, aho umwami databuja azaba, ni kuba gupfa cyangwa kuba muzima, aho ni ho umugaragu wawe nzaba.”
2_samweli:15:22: 22.Dawidi abwira Itayi ati “Genda wambuke.” Nuko Itayi w’Umugiti yambukana n’abantu be bose n’abana bari kumwe na we.
2_samweli:15:23: 23.Igihugu cyose gicura umuborogo n’ijwi rirenga. Abantu bose barambuka, kandi n’umwami yambuka akagezi kitwa Kidironi. Nuko abantu bose barambuka, berekeye inzira ijya mu butayu.
2_samweli:15:24: 24.Kandi Sadoki na we azana n’Abalewi bose, bahetse isanduku y’isezerano ry’Imana. Batereka hasi iyo sanduku y’Imana, maze Abiyatari arazamuka kugeza aho abantu barangirije kuva mu murwa.
2_samweli:15:25: 25.Umwami abwira Sadoki ati “Subiza isanduku mu murwa. Nindamuka mbonye imbabazi ku Uwiteka azangarurayo, kandi azayinyereka n’ubuturo bwe.
2_samweli:15:26: 26.Ariko nambwira atya ati ‘Sinkwishimira’, dore ndi hano nangenze uko ashaka.”
2_samweli:15:27: 27.Umwami abwira Sadoki umutambyi ati “Aho nturi bamenya? Subira mu murwa amahoro n’abahungu bawe bombi, Ahimāsi umwana wawe, na Yonatani umwana wa Abiyatari.
2_samweli:15:28: 28.Dore nzategerereza ku byambu byo ku ishyamba, kugeza aho muzantumiraho inkuru z’impamo.”
2_samweli:15:29: 29.Sadoki na Abiyatari ni ko guheka isanduku y’Imana bayisubiza i Yerusalemu, bagumayo.
2_samweli:15:30: 30.Dawidi aterera aho bazamukira ku musozi wa Elayono agenda arira ikijyaruguru, yari atwikiriye umutwe adakwese, kandi n’abari kumwe na we bose bitwikira imitwe bazamuka barira ikijyaruguru.
2_samweli:15:31: 31.Maze umuntu abwira Dawidi ko Ahitofeli ari umwe mu bajyanama z’ubugome, ufatanije na Abusalomu. Dawidi arasenga ati “Uwiteka ndakwinginze, hindura inama za Ahitofeli ubusa.”
2_samweli:15:32: 32.Dawidi ageze mu mpinga y’umusozi aho bajyaga basengera Imana, Hushayi w’Umwaruki aza guhura na we ashishimuye umwambaro we, igitaka kiri ku mutwe.
2_samweli:15:33: 33.Dawidi aramubwira ati “Nitujyana uzandushya.
2_samweli:15:34: 34.Ariko nusubira mu murwa ukabwira Abusalomu uti ‘Nzaba umugaragu wawe, nyagasani, nk’uko nari umugaragu wa so mu gihe gishize, na none ni ko nzaba umugaragu wawe.’ Nuko uzajye undogoyera inama za Ahitofeli.
2_samweli:15:35: 35.Mbese ntuzaba uri kumwe na Sadoki na Abiyatari b’abatambyi? Nuko nugira ijambo ryose wumva ibwami, uzajye uribwira Sadoki na Abiyatari b’abatambyi.
2_samweli:15:36: 36.Kandi bafiteyo abahungu babo bombi, Ahimāsi mwene Sadoki, na Yonatani mwene Abiyatari. Abo ni bo muzajya muntumaho, mumbwira ibyo muzumva byose.”
2_samweli:15:37: 37.Nuko Hushayi incuti ya Dawidi ajya mu murwa. Maze Abusalomu ajya i Yerusalemu.
2_samweli:16:1: Siba afasha Dawidi kandi abeshyera Mefibosheti1.Dawidi amaze kurenga mu gahinga ho gato, ahura na Siba umugaragu wa Mefibosheti azanye indogobe ebyiri ziriho amatandiko, kandi zikoreye amarobe y’imitsima magana abiri n’amasere y’inzabibu zumye ijana, n’ayandi ijana y’imbuto zo mu cyi n’imvumba ya vino.
2_samweli:16:2: 2.Umwami abaza Siba ati “Ibi ni iby’iki?” Siba aramusubiza ati “Indogobe ni izo guheka abo mu rugo rw’umwami, imitsima na yo n’imbuto zo mu cyi ni amafunguro y’abahungu, kandi vino ni iy’abazajya bagwira isari mu butayu bakayinywa.”
2_samweli:16:3: 3.Umwami aramubaza ati “Mbese mwene shobuja ari he?” Siba ati “Dore aba i Yerusalemu kuko yavuze ati ‘Ubu inzu ya Isirayeli izansubiza ku ngoma ya data.’ ”
2_samweli:16:4: 4.Umwami abwira Siba ati “Ubu nkugabiye ibya Mefibosheti byose.” Siba aravuga ati “Ngukuriye ubwatsi Mwami nyagasani, ndagahora ngutonaho.”
2_samweli:16:5: Shimeyi atuka Dawidi5.Umwami ageze i Bahurimu, abona haturutseyo umugabo wo mu muryango wa Sawuli witwaga Shimeyi mwene Gera, arasohoka aza amutuka.
2_samweli:16:6: 6.Atera Dawidi amabuye n’abagaragu b’Umwami Dawidi bose, kandi abantu bose n’abanyambaraga bose, bari bamukikije iburyo n’ibumoso.
2_samweli:16:7: 7.Shimeyi aramutuka ati “Genda genda wa mwicanyi we, wa kigoryi we.
2_samweli:16:8: 8.Uwiteka yakugaruyeho amaraso y’inzu ya Sawuli yose wizunguriye ugatwara, none Uwiteka yagabiye Abusalomu umuhungu wawe ubwami bwawe, kandi dore nawe uzize igomwa ryawe kuko uri umwicanyi.”
2_samweli:16:9: 9.Abishayi mwene Seruya abaza umwami ati “Ariko ni iki gituma tureka iyo mbwa y’intumbi agatuka umwami databuja? Ndakwinginze reka nambuke muce igihanga.”
2_samweli:16:10: 10.Umwami aravuga ati “Mpuriye he namwe, yemwe bene Seruya? Arantuka kuko Uwiteka ari we wamubwiye ati ‘Tuka Dawidi.’ None ni nde wabasha kumubuza ati ‘Ariko ibyo ubitewe ni iki?’ ”
2_samweli:16:11: 11.Maze Dawidi abwira Abishayi n’abagaragu be bose ati “Murareba uko umuhungu wanjye nibyariye agenza ubugingo bwanjye. Mbese uwo Mubenyamini ntiyarushaho? Nuko nimumureke yitukire, kuko Uwiteka yabimutegetse.
2_samweli:16:12: 12.Ahari Uwiteka azareba inabi ngirirwa, kandi Uwiteka azanyitura ibyiza ku bw’iyo mivumo yamvumye uyu munsi.”
2_samweli:16:13: 13.Nuko Dawidi n’abantu be bakomeza inzira. Shimeyi na we aca mu ibanga ry’umusozi amwitegeye, agenda amutuka umugenda, amutera amabuye n’umukungugu.
2_samweli:16:14: 14.Hanyuma umwami n’abantu bari kumwe na we bose bajya muri Ayefimu, aruhukirayo.
2_samweli:16:15: Abusalomu agisha Ahitofeli inama15.Ariko Abusalomu n’abantu ba Isirayeli bose bajya i Yerusalemu, na Ahitofeli ari kumwe na we.
2_samweli:16:16: 16.Maze Hushayi w’Umwaruki incuti ya Dawidi, aza kwa Abusalomu abwira Abusalomu ati “Umwami aragahoraho! Umwami aragahoraho!”
2_samweli:16:17: 17.Abusalomu abaza Hushayi ati “Mbese izo ni zo mbabazi ugiriye incuti yawe? Icyakubujije kujyana n’incuti yawe ni iki?”
2_samweli:16:18: 18.Hushayi abwira Abusalomu ati “Reka da! Ahubwo utoranijwe n’Uwiteka n’abantu n’Abisirayeli bose, nzaba uwe kandi nzagumana na we.
2_samweli:16:19: 19.Ikindi kandi, ni nde nkwiriye gukorera? Sinkwiriye gukorera umwana we? Nk’uko nakoreraga so, ni ko nzagukorera.”
2_samweli:16:20: 20.Maze Abusalomu abwira Ahitofeli ati “Tugire inama uko twagenza.”
2_samweli:16:21: 21.Ahitofeli abwira Abusalomu ati “Taha ku nshoreke za so yasize mu rugo, maze Abisirayeli bose bazamenya ko wazinutswe so cyane. Nuko abazaba bari kumwe nawe bose bazahama bakomere.”
2_samweli:16:22: 22.Nuko babambira Abusalomu ihema hejuru y’inzu. Abusalomu aherako ataha kuri izo nshoreke za se, Abisirayeli bose babireba.
2_samweli:16:23: 23.Kandi inama Ahitofeli yagishwaga muri iyo minsi, bazemeraga nk’izo bagiriwe n’Imana. Uko ni ko inama za Ahitofeli zameraga, yagiriye Dawidi kandi na Abusalomu.
2_samweli:17:1: Hushayi arogoya inama za Ahitofeli1.Ahitofeli arongera abwira Abusalomu ati “Reka ntoranye ingabo inzovu imwe n’ibihumbi bibiri, mpaguruke nkurikire Dawidi muri iri joro.
2_samweli:17:2: 2.Kandi ndamugwa gitumo arushye, amaboko ye atentebutse. Ndamutera ubwoba maze abantu bari kumwe na we bose bahunge, mpereko nice umwami wenyine.
2_samweli:17:3: 3.Maze nzakugarurira abantu bose. Nuko nubona uwo muntu ushaka uzaba ugaruye bose, maze abantu bose bazabe amahoro.”
2_samweli:17:4: 4.Abusalomu ashima iyo nama cyane, n’abatware ba Isirayeli bose barayishima.
2_samweli:17:5: 5.Abusalomu aravuga ati “None nimumpamagarire Hushayi w’Umwaruki, na we twumve icyo avuga.”
2_samweli:17:6: 6.Maze Hushayi yitabye Abusalomu, Abusalomu aramubwira ati “Ahitofeli yatubwiye ibi n’ibi. Mbese dukore uko yavuze? Niba atari uko, tubwire nawe.”
2_samweli:17:7: 7.Hushayi asubiza Abusalomu ati “Inama Ahitofeli yagiye kuri ubu si nziza.”
2_samweli:17:8: 8.Kandi ati “Uzi so n’ingabo ze ko ari abanyambaraga, kandi ubu baratse mu mitima yabo nk’idubu yākiwe abana bayo ku gasozi. Kandi uzi so ko ari intwari, ntagomba icumbi mu bantu.
2_samweli:17:9: 9.None ubu yihishe mu mwobo cyangwa ahandi. Nuko nihagira bamwe bapfa bagitangira kurwana, uzabyumva wese azagira ati ‘Hapfuye benshi bo mu bakurikiye Abusalomu’,
2_samweli:17:10: 10.bizatuma umuntu wese naho ari intwari ifite umutima nk’uw’intare ahamuka, kuko Abisirayeli bose bazi so ko ari umunyambaraga, kandi n’abo bari kumwe ko ari intwari.
2_samweli:17:11: 11.Ahubwo jyewe inama nkugira ni iyi: teranya Abisirayeli bose uhereye i Dani ukageza i Bērisheba, bangane n’umusenyi wo mu kibaya cy’inyanja ubwinshi, kandi nawe ubwawe uzatabarane na bo.
2_samweli:17:12: 12.Tuzamurasukiraho aho azaba ari hose, tumutondeho nk’ikime uko gitonda ku isi. Nuko uhereye kuri we ukageza ku bantu bari kumwe na we bose, ntituzasigaza n’umwe.
2_samweli:17:13: 13.Kandi naramuka agiye mu mudugudu, na bwo Abisirayeli bose bazazana imirunga, dukururire uwo mudugudu mu mugezi kugeza aho hatazabonekayo akabuye na kamwe.”
2_samweli:17:14: 14.Nuko Abusalomu n’abantu ba Isirayeli bose baravuga bati “Inama ya Hushayi w’Umwaruki iruse inama ya Ahitofeli”, kuko Uwiteka yagambiriye kurogoya inama nziza ya Ahitofeli, kugira ngo Uwiteka atere Abusalomu ibyago.
2_samweli:17:15: Bazanira Dawidi inkuru z’izo nama15.Maze Hushayi abwira Sadoki na Abiyatari b’abatambyi ati “Inama Ahitofeli yagiriye Abusalomu n’abatware ba Isirayeli ni iyi, ariko jyeweho namugiriye ntya na ntya.
2_samweli:17:16: 16.Nuko none mutume kuri Dawidi vuba muti ‘Iri joro nturare ku byambu byo ku butayu, ahubwo ntihagire ikikubuza kwambuka, kugira ngo umwami atamiranwa n’abo bari kumwe bose.’ ”
2_samweli:17:17: 17.Kandi Yonatani na Ahimāsi babaga Enirogeli, umuja akajya aza kubabwira, na bo bakajya babibwira Umwami Dawidi, kuko batari bakwiriye kwinjira mu murwa ku mugaragaro.
2_samweli:17:18: 18.Ariko umuhungu arababona, abibwira Abusalomu, bagenda bihuta bombi bagera ku mugabo w’i Bahurimu wari ufite iriba mu rugo rwe, barijyamo.
2_samweli:17:19: 19.Maze umugore asingira igipfundikizo, agipfundikiza ku munwa w’iriba, hejuru yacyo asanzaho ingano zisekuye, ntihagira ikimenywa.
2_samweli:17:20: 20.Hanyuma abagaragu ba Abusalomu binjira mu rugo basanga uwo mugore, baramubaza bati “Ahimāsi na Yonatani bari he?” Umugore arabasubiza ati “Bakutse akagezi.” Nuko babashatse barababura, basubira i Yerusalemu.
2_samweli:17:21: 21.Bamaze kugenda ba bandi bakuka mu iriba, baragenda babibwira Umwami Dawidi bati “Nimuhaguruke mwambuke uruzi vuba, kuko Ahitofeli yabagiriye inama atyo zo kubarwanya.”
2_samweli:17:22: 22.Nuko Dawidi ahagurukana n’abantu bari kumwe na we bose bambuka Yorodani, umuseke utambika nta n’umwe muri bo wari utarambuka Yorodani.
2_samweli:17:23: 23.Ariko Ahitofeli abonye ko badakurikije inama ye, ashyira amatandiko ku ndogobe ye, arahaguruka ataha iwe mu mudugudu w’iwabo, atunganya inzu ye yiyahuza umugozi arapfa, bamuhamba mu gituro cya se.
2_samweli:17:24: 24.Nuko Dawidi ajya i Mahanayimu, Abusalomu na we yambuka Yorodani ari kumwe n’Abisirayeli bose.
2_samweli:17:25: 25.Maze Abusalomu agira Amasa umugaba w’ingabo ze, mu cyimbo cya Yowabu. Kandi Amasa uwo yari umwana w’umugabo witwa Itura w’Umwisirayeli, waryamanye na Abigayili mwene Nahashi murumuna wa Seruya nyina wa Yowabu.
2_samweli:17:26: 26.Abisirayeli na Abusalomu bagerereza mu gihugu cy’i Galeyadi.
2_samweli:17:27: 27.Hanyuma Dawidi ageze i Mahanayimu, Shobi mwene Nahashi w’i Raba y’Abamoni, na Makiri mwene Amiyeli w’i Lodebari, na Barizilayi w’Umunyagaleyadi w’i Rogelimu,
2_samweli:17:28: 28.bamuzanira amariri n’inzabya n’inkono, n’ingano na sayiri n’ifu n’ingano zikaranze, n’ibishyimbo n’udushyimbo duto n’inkori zikaranze,
2_samweli:17:29: 29.n’ubuki n’amavuta, n’intama n’amavuta akuze bihawe Dawidi n’abo bari kumwe ngo babirye, kuko bari bavuze ngo abantu barashonje bararuha, bīcirwa n’umwuma mu butayu.
2_samweli:18:1: Abisirayeli barwana n’aba Dawidi, Abusalomu agwayo1.Maze Dawidi abara abantu bari kumwe na we, abaha abatware bo gutwara imitwe y’ibihumbi, n’abo gutwara iy’amagana.
2_samweli:18:2: 2.Dawidi aherako agaba ingabo, igice cya gatatu agiha Yowabu, ikindi agiha Abishayi mwene Seruya, mwene se wa Yowabu, ikindi gice cya gatatu agiha Itayi w’Umugiti. Umwami abwira abantu ati “Nanjye ubwanjye sindi bubure gutabarana namwe.”
2_samweli:18:3: 3.Abantu baramuhakanira bati “Wowe nturi butabare, kuko niduhunga batazatwitaho, ndetse nubwo igice cya kabiri cy’abantu bacu cyapfa na bwo ntibatwitaho, kuko uhwanye n’abantu bacu inzovu. Ahubwo ibyarutaho ni uko wakwitegura kudutabara uturutse mu mudugudu.”
2_samweli:18:4: 4.Umwami arababwira ati “Ikibabereye icyiza ni cyo ndi bukore.” Nuko umwami ahagarara mu bikingi by’amarembo ingabo zose zirasohoka, amagana n’ibihumbi.
2_samweli:18:5: 5.Maze umwami yihanangiriza Yowabu na Abishayi na Itayi ati “Ku bwanjye murangenzereze neza uwo muhungu Abusalomu.” Kandi abantu bose bumva uko umwami yihanangirije abagaba bose ibya Abusalomu.
2_samweli:18:6: 6.Nuko abantu bajya kurwanira n’Abisirayeli ku gasozi, urugamba rusakiranira mu ishyamba rya Efurayimu.
2_samweli:18:7: 7.Abisirayeli bahanesherezwa n’abagaragu ba Dawidi, maze uwo munsi hapfa abantu inzovu ebyiri,
2_samweli:18:8: 8.kuko intambara yari yasandaye muri icyo gihugu cyose. Uwo munsi ijuri ryica abantu benshi kuruta abishwe n’inkota.
2_samweli:18:9: 9.Hanyuma Abusalomu ahubirana n’abagaragu ba Dawidi, kandi yari ku nyumbu ye. Maze inyumbu ye imunyurana munsi y’amashami y’impatanwa y’umwela w’ingāra, umutwe we ufatwa n’amashami yawo, ahera mu kirere hagati y’ijuru n’isi, inyumbu ye yari imuhetse irakomeza iragenda.
2_samweli:18:10: 10.Maze umugabo aramubona abibwira Yowabu ati “Nabonye Abusalomu anagana ku mwela.”
2_samweli:18:11: 11.Yowabu abaza nyir’ukumubwira ati “Dorere, umubonye ni iki cyatumye utamusogoterayo ukamutura hasi, ko mba nkugororeye ibice by’ifeza cumi n’umushumi?”
2_samweli:18:12: 12.Uwo mugabo asubiza Yowabu ati “Naho nagororerwa ibice by’ifeza igihumbi, sinakwemera kurambura ukuboko kwanjye ku mwana w’umwami, kuko twumvise umwami akwihanangirizanya na Abishayi na Itayi ati ‘Mwirinde hatagira ukora kuri uwo muhungu Abusalomu.’
2_samweli:18:13: 13.None iyaba nabigenje ukundi ngakoberanya ubugingo bwe (kandi nta jambo umwami ahishwa), wowe ho wajyaga kubyigurutsa.”
2_samweli:18:14: 14.Yowabu aravuga ati “Simbasha gushyogoranya nawe ntyo.” Ajyana imyambi itatu, ayitikura Abusalomu mu mutima akiri muzima, aho yari ari mu mwela.
2_samweli:18:15: 15.Maze abahungu cumi b’abanyantwaro za Yowabu bagota Abusalomu, baramusogota arapfa.
2_samweli:18:16: 16.Yowabu aherako avuza ikondera, ingabo zirahindukira zirorera gukurikira Abisirayeli, kuko Yowabu yazibujije.
2_samweli:18:17: 17.Nuko bajyana Abusalomu bamujugunya mu bushya bunini bwo mu ijuri, bamurundaho ikirundo cy’amabuye kinini cyane, maze Abisirayeli bose barahunga, umuntu wese ajya mu ihema rye.
2_samweli:18:18: 18.Kandi Abusalomu akiri muzima, yari yajyanye inkingi ayishinga mu gikombe cy’umwami, kuko yari yaravuze ati “Nta mwana w’umuhungu mfite, ngo bazamunyibukireho izina ryanjye”, ni ko kwitirira iyo nkingi izina rye. Nuko yitwa inkingi y’urwibutso rwa Abusalomu na bugingo n’ubu.
2_samweli:18:19: Babikira umwami ko Abusalomu yapfuye19.Ahimāsi mwene Sadoki aravuga ati “Reka niruke mbwire umwami amacumu y’uko Uwiteka yamuhoreye inzigo y’abanzi be.”
2_samweli:18:20: 20.Yowabu aramubwira ati “Ntujya kuvuga amacumu uyu munsi, uzaba uyavuga ubundi. Ariko uyu munsi nturi buyavuge, kuko umwana w’umwami yapfuye.”
2_samweli:18:21: 21.Yowabu abwira Umukushi ati “Hoshi genda ubwire umwami ibyo wabonye.” Nuko Umukushi aca bugufi imbere ya Yowabu, ariruka.
2_samweli:18:22: 22.Ahimāsi mwene Sadoki arongera abwira Yowabu ati “Nta cyo bitwaye, ndakwinginze reka mpfe kugenda nkurikire uwo Mukushi.” Yowabu ati “Urirukanwa n’iki mwana wanjye, ko uzi ko utazahemberwa izo nkuru?”
2_samweli:18:23: 23.Undi ati “Nta cyo bitwaye mpfuye kugenda.” Yowabu ati “Irukanka.” Nuko Ahimāsi arirukanka aciye iy’ikigarama yose, anyura ku Mukushi.
2_samweli:18:24: 24.Kandi Dawidi yari yicaye hagati y’amarembo abiri, maze umurinzi yurira hejuru y’irembo ahateganye n’inkike z’amabuye, arambura amaso abona umuntu wiruka ari wenyine.
2_samweli:18:25: 25.Umurinzi ashyira ejuru abibwira umwami. Umwami aravuga ati “Niba ari wenyine hariho inkuru aje kubara.” Nuko aza yihuta agera hafi.
2_samweli:18:26: 26.Maze umurinzi abona undi mugabo wiruka. Umurinzi ahamagara umukumirizi ati “Dore undi mugabo wiruka ari wenyine.” Umwami aravuga ati “Na we azanye indi nkuru.”
2_samweli:18:27: 27.Umurinzi aravuga ati “Ngira ngo imyirukire y’uw’imbere isa n’iya Ahimāsi mwene Sadoki.” Umwami aravuga ati “Ni umugabo mwiza kandi azanye inkuru nziza.”
2_samweli:18:28: 28.Ahimāsi ashyira ejuru abwira umwami ati “Byose byabaye byiza.” Nuko yikubita hasi imbere y’umwami yubamye, aravuga ati “Uwiteka Imana yawe ihimbazwe, yakugabije abantu bari bahagurukirije amaboko yabo ku mwami databuja.”
2_samweli:18:29: 29.Umwami aramubaza ati “Wa muhungu Abusalomu ni amahoro?” Ahimāsi aramusubiza ati “Ubwo Yowabu yatumaga umugaragu w’umwami, umugaragu wawe narebaga abantu bacitsemo igikuba, ariko sinamenya ibyo ari byo.”
2_samweli:18:30: 30.Umwami aramubwira ati “Tambuka uhagarare hano.” Nuko aratambuka arihagararira.
2_samweli:18:31: 31.Umukushi araza aravuga ati “Ndi kabarankuru z’umwami databuja, kuko uyu munsi Uwiteka yaguhoreye inzigo kuri ba bandi baguhagurukiye bose.”
2_samweli:18:32: 32.Umwami abaza Umukushi ati “Wa muhungu Abusalomu ni amahoro?” Umukushi aramusubiza ati “Abanzi b’umwami databuja, n’abantu bose bahagurukiye kukugirira nabi, barakaba uko uwo muhungu yabaye.”
