2_samweli:19:1: 1.Umwami abyumvise arasubirwa cyane, yurira mu nzu yo hejuru y’irembo arira. Nuko akigenda, agenda avuga atya ati “Ye baba we, mwana wanjye Abusalomu! Mwana wanjye, mwana wanjye Abusalomu we! Iyaba ari jye wapfuye mu cyimbo cyawe, Abusalomu mwana wanjye, mwana wanjye.”
2_samweli:19:2: Yowabu ahana Dawidi kuborogera Abusalomu2.Maze babwira Yowabu bati “Dore umwami araririra Abusalomu aboroga!”
2_samweli:19:3: 3.Uwo munsi impundu zihinduka induru mu bantu bose, kuko bari bumvise bavuga ngo umwami yibabarijwe n’umwana we.
2_samweli:19:4: 4.Uwo munsi abantu basubira mu mudugudu babebēra, nk’abantu bahunze mu ntambara, babebēra bafite isoni.
2_samweli:19:5: 5.Umwami yitwikira mu maso, ashyira ejuru n’ijwi rirenga ati “Ye baba we, mwana wanjye Abusalomu! Ye baba we, Abusalomu mwana wanjye, mwana wanjye we!”
2_samweli:19:6: 6.Hanyuma Yowabu yinjira mu nzu, asanga umwami aravuga ati “Uyu munsi wateye amaso y’abagaragu bawe ipfunwe: bakijije ubugingo bwawe ubu n’ubw’abahungu bawe n’abakobwa bawe, n’abagore bawe n’inshoreke zawe,
2_samweli:19:7: 7.kandi ukunda abakwanga, ukanga abagukunda. None weruye ko ibikomangoma n’abagaragu bawe ari nk’ubusa kuri wowe, ubu menye ko, iyaba Abusalomu yabaye muzima tukaba ari twe twapfuye twese uyu munsi, uba wabyishimiye cyane.
2_samweli:19:8: 8.Nuko none haguruka usohoke, uvugane n’abagaragu bawe uhumurize imitima yabo. Ndahiye Uwiteka, nudasohoka nta mugabo n’umwe uri busigarane iri joro. Kandi ibyo bizakumerera nabi kuruta ibyago wakabonye byose, uhereye mu buto bwawe, ukageza ubu.”
2_samweli:19:9: 9.Maze umwami arahaguruka yicara ku karubanda, babwira abantu bose bati “Dore umwami yicaye ku karubanda”. Nuko abantu bose baramushengerera.
2_samweli:19:10: Abisirayeli n’Abayuda bajya inama yo kugarura Dawidi Kandi Abisirayeli bose bari barahunze, umuntu wese yigira mu ihema rye.10.Abantu bose bo mu miryango yose y’Abisirayeli baritonganyaga bati “Umwami ni we waturengeye mu maboko y’ababisha bacu, akadukiza amaboko y’Abafilisitiya, none yahunze Abusalomu, ava mu gihugu.
2_samweli:19:11: 11.Kandi Abusalomu na we twimikishije amavuta ngo adutware, yaguye mu ntambara. Mbese none murabuzwa n’iki kuvuga ibyo kugarura umwami?”
2_samweli:19:12: 12.Bukeye Umwami Dawidi atuma kuri Sadoki na Abiyatari abatambyi ati “Mubaze abatware b’Abayuda muti ‘Ni iki gituma ari mwe mugiye guheruka abandi kugarura umwami mu rurembo rwe, (kuko amagambo y’Abisirayeli bose amaze kugera ku mwami ngo bamugarure mu rurembo rwe),
2_samweli:19:13: 13.kandi ari mwebwe bene se muva inda imwe? None ni iki gitumye mugiye guheruka abandi kugarura umwami?’
2_samweli:19:14: 14.Kandi mumbarize Amasa muti ‘Mbese ntuzi ko muva inda imwe? Nuko rero nutaba umugaba w’ingabo ze iminsi yose mu cyimbo cya Yowabu, Imana ibimuhore ndetse bikabije.’ ”
2_samweli:19:15: 15.Nuko yoshyoshya atyo imitima y’Abayuda bose nk’umutima w’umuntu umwe, baherako batuma ku mwami bati “Garukana n’abagaragu bawe bose.”
2_samweli:19:16: 16.Nuko umwami aragaruka agera kuri Yorodani. Abayuda bajya i Gilugali gusanganira umwami no kumwambutsa Yorodani.
2_samweli:19:17: Shimeyi aza kwitwara ku mwami17.Shimeyi na we mwene Gera w’Umubenyamini w’i Bahurimu, arihuta amanukana n’Abayuda gusanganira Umwami Dawidi.
2_samweli:19:18: 18.Kandi yari kumwe n’Ababenyamini igihumbi, na Siba umugaragu w’imbata wa Sawuli, n’abahungu be cumi na batanu n’abagaragu be makumyabiri bari kumwe na we, bambuka Yorodani umwami abitegeye.
2_samweli:19:19: 19.Ubwato bwajyaga bucuragana bwambuka ngo bwambutse abo mu rugo rw’umwami, no kumukorera ibyo ashaka. Umwami amaze kwambuka Yorodani, Shimeyi mwene Gera yikubita hasi imbere ye.
2_samweli:19:20: 20.Abwira umwami ati “Mwami nyagasani, we kumbaraho gukiranirwa, kandi we kwibuka ibyo umugaragu wawe nakoranye ubugome, umunsi waviriye i Yerusalemu, ngo bikubabaze mu mutima,
2_samweli:19:21: 21.kuko umugaragu wawe nzi ko nacumuye. Ni cyo gitumye ubu mbaye uw’ibanze mu muryango wa Yosefu wose, nkamanurwa no gusanganira umwami databuja.”
2_samweli:19:22: 22.Ariko Abishayi mwene Seruya aravuga ati “Mbese harya Shimeyi ntaribwicwe, azira ko yavumye uwo Uwiteka yimikishije amavuta?”
2_samweli:19:23: 23.Dawidi aravuga ati “Ariko yemwe bene Seruya, ndapfa iki namwe gitumye mumbera abanzi uyu munsi? Mbese hariho uwo kwicwa mu Isirayeli uyu munsi? Ubu se sinamenye ko mbaye umwami wa Isirayeli?”
2_samweli:19:24: 24.Umwami aherako abwira Shimeyi ati “Nturi bupfe.” Aramurahira.
2_samweli:19:25: Mefibosheti aza gusanganira umwami25.Kandi Mefibosheti mwene Sawuli aramanuka aza gusanganira umwami. Uhereye umunsi umwami yagendeye ukageza aho yagarukiye iwe amahoro, ntiyigeze kwikenura ibirenge, cyangwa kwikemuza ubwanwa, haba no kumesa imyenda ye.
2_samweli:19:26: 26.Ageze i Yerusalemu gusanganira umwami, umwami aramubaza ati “Ariko icyakubujije kujyana nanjye ni iki, Mefibosheti?”
2_samweli:19:27: 27.Aramusubiza ati “Mwami nyagasani, umugaragu wanjye yarambeshye, kuko umugaragu wawe nari ngize nti ‘Ngiye gushyira amatandiko ku ndogobe, nyijyeho njyane n’umwami, kuko umugaragu wawe ndi ikimuga.’
2_samweli:19:28: 28.Kandi yambeshyeye ku mwami databuja, ariko rero nyagasani, umeze nka marayika w’Imana. Nuko kora icyo ushaka,
2_samweli:19:29: 29.kuko abo mu rugo rwa data bose imbere y’umwami databuja basaga n’abapfuye, ariko wari unyicaje mu basangiraga ku meza yawe. Nuko mfite butware ki kongera gutakambira umwami ukundi?”
2_samweli:19:30: 30.Umwami aramubwira ati “Ni iki gitumye wongera kuvuga ibyawe? Ndabitegetse ngo wowe na Siba nimugabane igikingi mo kabiri.”
2_samweli:19:31: 31.Mefibosheti abwira umwami ati “Yenda akijyane cyose, ubwo umwami databuja asohoye amahoro mu rugo rwe.”
2_samweli:19:32: Dawidi ashimira Barizilayi ibyo yamukoreye32.Hanyuma Barizilayi w’Umunyagaleyadi ava i Rogelimu, aramanuka yambukana n’umwami Yorodani ngo amugeze hakurya.
2_samweli:19:33: 33.Barizilayi uwo yari umusaza mukuru cyane amaze imyaka mirongo inani avutse, kandi ni we wagemuriye umwami ubwo yari i Mahanayimu, kuko yari umugabo ukomeye cyane.
2_samweli:19:34: 34.Umwami abwira Barizilayi ati “Ngwino tujyane i Yerusalemu ngukirizeyo.”
2_samweli:19:35: 35.Ariko Barizilayi abwira umwami ati “Uzi nshigaje imyaka ingahe nkiriho, yatuma nzamukana n’umwami i Yerusalemu?
2_samweli:19:36: 36.Ubu ko maze imyaka mirongo inani mvutse, mbese ndacyabasha gusobanura ibyiza n’ibibi? Umugaragu wawe ndacyaryoherwa n’ibyo ndya cyangwa n’ibyo nywa? Ndacyabasha kumva amajwi y’abaririmbyi b’abagabo n’abagore? None icyatuma umugaragu wawe ndushya umwami databuja ni iki?
2_samweli:19:37: 37.Umugaragu wawe reka mpfe kwambukana n’umwami Yorodani gusa. Ni iki cyatuma umwami angororera ingororano ingana ityo?
2_samweli:19:38: 38.Ahubwo ndakwinginze, reka umugaragu wawe nisubirire mu mudugudu w’iwacu abe ari ho nzasazira, aho igituro cya data na mama kiri. Ahubwo dore umugaragu wawe Kimuhamu nguyu, abe ari we wambukana n’umwami databuja, uzamugire uko ushaka.”
2_samweli:19:39: 39.Umwami aramusubiza ati “Nuko Kimuhamu nahoshi twambukane, kandi nzamugira uko ushaka, kandi icyo uzanshakaho cyose nzakigukorera.”
2_samweli:19:40: 40.Nuko abantu bose bambuka Yorodani, umwami arambuka. Maze umwami asoma Barizilayi amusabira umugisha, yisubirira iwabo.
2_samweli:19:41: 41.Uko ni ko umwami yambutse ajya i Gilugali, Kimuhamu yambukana na we. Abayuda bose n’ab’igice cya Isirayeli bambutsa umwami.
2_samweli:19:42: 42.Bukeye Abisirayeli bose basanga umwami baramubaza bati “Mwami Dawidi, ni iki gitumye bene wacu b’Abayuda bakuzana rwihishwa, bakakwambutsanya Yorodani n’abo mu rugo rwawe n’abantu bawe bose?”
2_samweli:19:43: 43.Abayuda bose basubiza Abisirayeli bati “Ni uko umwami agira icyo apfana natwe. None bibarakarije iki? Hari ubwo twatunzwe n’umwami, cyangwa se hari impano yose yaduhaye?”
2_samweli:19:44: 44.Abisirayeli basubiza Abayuda bati “Ni twe bice cumi by’umwami, kandi rero Dawidi akwiriye kubaho ku bwacu kuruta mwebwe. Ni iki cyatumye mudusuzugura, ntimubanze kutugisha inama yo kugarura umwami wacu?” Ariko amagambo y’Abayuda arusha ay’Abisirayeli gushēga.
2_samweli:20:1: Ubugome bwa Sheba1.Hariho umugabo w’ikigoryi witwaga Sheba mwene Bikuri w’Umubenyamini, avuza ikondera, aravuga ati “Nta mugabane dufite kuri Dawidi, nta n’umurage dufite kuri mwene Yesayi. Yemwe Bisirayeli, umuntu wese najye mu ihema rye.”
2_samweli:20:2: 2.Nuko Abisirayeli bose barorera gukurikira Dawidi, bakurikira Sheba mwene Bikuri, ariko Abayuda bose uhereye i Yorodani ukageza Yerusalemu, bomatana n’umwami wabo.
2_samweli:20:3: 3.Bukeye Dawidi ajya i Yerusalemu mu rugo rwe. Umwami ajyana ba bagore be b’inshoreke uko ari icumi, abo yari yasize ku rugo, abashyira aho barindirwa abagaburirirayo, ariko ntiyabatahaho. Nuko bagumaho barindwa kugeza aho bapfiriye, ari intabwa.
2_samweli:20:4: 4.Bukeye umwami abwira Amasa ati “Huruza Abayuda bateranire hano iminsi itatu itarashira, kandi nawe uzabe uhari.”
2_samweli:20:5: 5.Nuko Amasa ajya guhuruza Abayuda, ariko arenza iminsi umwami yamutegetse.
2_samweli:20:6: 6.Dawidi abwira Abishayi ati “Ubu Sheba mwene Bikuri azatugirira nabi kurusha Abusalomu. Hoshi jyana abagaragu ba shobuja mumukurikire, kugira ngo adahindūra imidugudu igoswe n’inkike z’amabuye, akaba adukize.”
2_samweli:20:7: 7.Nuko ingabo za Yowabu zirasohoka ziramukurikira, hamwe n’Abakereti n’Abapeleti n’abanyamaboko bose, bava i Yerusalemu bajya kugenza Sheba mwene Bikuri.
2_samweli:20:8: Yowabu yica Amasa8.Bageze ku ibuye rinini ry’i Gibeyoni, Amasa aza kubasanganira. Kandi Yowabu yari yambaye imyambaro y’intambara, ayikenyeje umushumi uriho inkota ifashe ku itako mu rwubati rwayo. Yigiye imbere, inkota iva mu rwubati iragwa.
2_samweli:20:9: 9.Yowabu abwira Amasa ati “Uri amahoro, mwene data?” Yowabu afatisha Amasa ukuboko kw’indyo ku kananwa ngo amusome.
2_samweli:20:10: 10.Ariko Amasa ntiyita ku nkota yari ku kuboko kwa Yowabu, nuko ayimutikura ku nda amara ye adendeza hasi, ntiyongera kumutikura ubwa kabiri arapfa. Maze Yowabu na Abishayi mwene se bakomeza kugenza Sheba mwene Bikuri.
2_samweli:20:11: 11.Ariko umuhungu wo mu ba Yowabu amuhagarara hejuru, aravuga ati “Ukunda Yowabu kandi uri mu ruhande rwa Dawidi, nakurikire Yowabu.”
2_samweli:20:12: 12.Kandi Amasa yari agaramye hagati mu nzira yigaragura mu maraso ye. Uwo mugabo abonye ko abantu bose bahagungirira, aterura Amasa amukura mu nzira, amurambika ku gasozi amworosa umwambaro, kuko yabonye ko uwamugeragaho wese yahagungiriraga.
2_samweli:20:13: 13.Amaze gukurwa mu nzira, abantu bose bahomboka kuri Yowabu, bagenza Sheba mwene Bikuri.
2_samweli:20:14: 14.Yowabu azerera mu miryango ya Isirayeli yose, agera muri Abeli y’i Betimāka no mu Baberi bose, na bo baraterana baramukurikira.
2_samweli:20:15: 15.Nuko baraza bagotera Sheba muri Abeli y’i Betimāka, maze barunda ikirundo ku mudugudu cyegamiye inkike yawo cyo kuririraho. Abantu bose bari kumwe na Yowabu bakubita inkike y’amabuye, kugira ngo bayigushe.
2_samweli:20:16: 16.Maze umugore w’umunyabwenge wo muri uwo mudugudu ashyira ejuru aravuga ati “Nimwumve! Nimwumve! Ndabinginze mumbwirire Yowabu muti ‘Igira hino muvugane.’ ”
2_samweli:20:17: 17.Aramwegera. Umugore aramubaza ati “Mbega ni wowe Yowabu?” Na we ati “Ni jye.” Aherako aramubwira ati “Umva amagambo y’umuja wawe.” Na we ati “Ndumva.”
2_samweli:20:18: 18.Aravuga ati “Kera baravugaga ngo ntibazabura kugisha inama muri Abeli, nuko bamaramarizaho iryo jambo.”
2_samweli:20:19: 19.Ati “Ndi umwe mu banyamahoro kandi biringirwa muri Isirayeli, none urashaka kurimburana umudugudu n’umubyeyi wo muri Isirayeli. Urashakira iki kumirana bunguri gakondo y’Uwiteka?”
2_samweli:20:20: 20.Yowabu aramusubiza ati “Biragatsindwa! Biragatsindwa ko mira bunguri cyangwa ko ndimbura.
2_samweli:20:21: 21.Si ko biri, ahubwo hariho umugabo wo mu gihugu cy’imisozi miremire ya Efurayimu witwa Sheba mwene Bikuri, yahagurukirije ukuboko kwe ku Mwami Dawidi. Mube ari we mutanga wenyine mbone kubavira ku mudugudu.” Uwo mugore abwira Yowabu ati “Umva ye, igihanga cye turakikurengereza inkike.”
2_samweli:20:22: 22.Nuko uwo mugore ajya mu bantu bose mu nama z’ubwenge bwe, maze Sheba mwene Bikuri baherako bamuca igihanga, bakijugunyira Yowabu. Yowabu avuza ikondera, abantu bose barasandara bava ku mudugudu, umuntu wese asubira mu ihema rye. Yowabu aherako atabarukira umwami i Yerusalemu.
2_samweli:20:23: 23.Yowabu ni we wari umugaba w’ingabo za Isirayeli zose. Benaya mwene Yehoyada ni we wari umutware w’Abakereti n’Abapeleti.
2_samweli:20:24: 24.Adoramu yategekaga ikoro, Yehoshafati mwene Ahiludi yari umucurabwenge.
2_samweli:20:25: 25.Sheva yari umwanditsi, Sadoki na Abiyatari bari abatambyi.
2_samweli:20:26: 26.Ira w’Umuyayiri yari umutware w’intebe wa Dawidi.
2_samweli:21:1: Ab’i Gibeyoni bihōrera1.Bukeye ku ngoma ya Dawidi hatera inzara, imara imyaka itatu uko yakurikiranye, Dawidi asobanuza Uwiteka. Uwiteka aravuga ati “Bitewe na Sawuli n’inzu ye y’abicanyi, kuko yishe ab’i Gibeyoni.”
2_samweli:21:2: 2.Maze umwami ahamagaza ab’i Gibeyoni, arabibabwira. (Kandi ab’i Gibeyoni ntibari abo mu miryango ya Isirayeli, ahubwo bari Abamori bacitse ku icumu, kandi Abisirayeli bari barasezeranye na bo. Ariko Sawuli yashakaga kubica, abitewe n’ishyaka yagiriraga Abisirayeli n’Abayuda.)
2_samweli:21:3: 3.Dawidi abaza ab’i Gibeyoni ati “Mbagirire nte? Natanga iki ho impano, kugira ngo musabire gakondo y’Uwiteka umugisha?”
2_samweli:21:4: 4.Ab’i Gibeyoni baramusubiza bati “Icyo dushaka kuri Sawuli n’umuryango we si ifeza cyangwa izahabu, kandi si ibyacu kugira umuntu twica muri Isirayeli.” Na we aravuga ati “Uko mushaka ni ko nzabagirira.”
2_samweli:21:5: 5.Babwira umwami bati “Uwo mugabo waturimbuye, akadushakira ubwenge bwo kudutsemba ngo tutaba mu bihugu bya Isirayeli byose,
2_samweli:21:6: 6.nimuduhe abagabo barindwi bo mu bahungu be, tubamanikire imbere y’Uwiteka i Gibeya kwa Sawuli, intore y’Uwiteka.” Umwami aravuga ati “Nzabatanga.”
2_samweli:21:7: 7.Ariko umwami arokora Mefibosheti mwene Yonatani, mwene Sawuli, ku bw’indahiro Dawidi na Yonatani mwene Sawuli barahiranije imbere y’Uwiteka.
2_samweli:21:8: 8.Nuko umwami afata abahungu babiri ba Risipa umukobwa wa Ayiya yabyaranye na Sawuli, Arumoni na Mefibosheti, kandi n’abahungu batanu ba Merabu umukobwa wa Sawuli yabyaranye na Aduriyeli, mwene Barizilayi w’Umumeholati.
2_samweli:21:9: 9.Abatanga mu maboko y’ab’i Gibeyoni babamanika ku musozi imbere y’Uwiteka, bapfira icyarimwe bose uko ari barindwi, bicwa mu isarura rigitangira, batangiye gusarura sayiri.
2_samweli:21:10: 10.Risipa umukobwa wa Ayiya yenda ikigunira acyisasira ku rutare, uhereye mu itangira ry’isarura ukageze igihe cy’imvura y’umuhindo yashyaniye kuri izo ntumbi, ntiyakundira ibisiga byo mu kirere ko bizirya ku manywa, cyangwa inyamaswa zo mu ishyamba ziza nijoro.
2_samweli:21:11: 11.Bukeye babwira Dawidi ibya Risipa umukobwa wa Ayiya inshoreke ya Sawuli, icyo yakoze.
2_samweli:21:12: 12.Dawidi aragenda akura amagufwa ya Sawuli na Yonatani umuhungu we mu bantu b’i Yabeshi y’i Galeyadi, bari baranyaze mu nzira y’i Betishani, aho Abafilisitiya bari barayamanitse kuri wa munsi Abafilisitiya biciraga Sawuli i Gilibowa.
2_samweli:21:13: 13.Akurayo amagufwa ya Sawuli na Yonatani umuhungu we, maze bateranya amagufwa ya ba bandi bamanitswe.
2_samweli:21:14: 14.Nuko bahamba amagufwa ya Sawuli na Yonatani umuhungu we i Sela mu gihugu cy’Ububenyamini, mu gituro cya se Kishi, basohoza ibyo umwami yategetse byose. Hanyuma y’ibyo Imana ibona guhendahenderwa igihugu.
2_samweli:21:15: Izindi ntambara za Dawidi (1 Ngoma 20.4-8)15.Bukeye Abafilisitiya bongera kurwana n’Abisirayeli. Dawidi amanukana n’abagaragu be arwana n’Abafilisitiya, bakirwana Dawidi agwa isari.
2_samweli:21:16: 16.Maze Ishubibenobu, wo muri bene cya gihanda, kuremera kw’icumu rye kwari shekeli z’umuringa magana atatu, yambaye inkota nshya ashaka kwica Dawidi.
2_samweli:21:17: 17.Ariko Abishayi mwene Seruya aramuvuna, atikura Umufilisitiya aramwica. Maze abantu ba Dawidi baramurahiza bati “Ntukongere gutabarana natwe, utazazimya itabaza rya Isirayeli.”
2_samweli:21:18: 18.Hanyuma y’ibyo hongera kubaho intambara ku Bafilisitiya i Goba. Sibekayi w’Umuhusha yica Safu wo muri bene cya gihanda.
2_samweli:21:19: 19.Bukeye hongera kubaho intambara ku Bafilisitiya i Goba, Eluhanani mwene Yaroregimu w’i Betelehemu yica Goliyati w’Umugiti, uruti rw’icumu rye rwasaga n’igiti kiboherwaho imyenda.
2_samweli:21:20: 20.Bukeye kandi habaho intambara i Gati, hariyo umugabo muremure cyane, yari afite intoki eshanu ziriho indegeya ku maboko yombi, n’amano atandatu ku maguru yombi, byose byari makumyabiri na bine, kandi na we yabyawe na cya gihanda.
2_samweli:21:21: 21.Ashujuguje Isirayeli, Yonatani mwene Shimeya mukuru wa Dawidi aramwica.
2_samweli:21:22: 22.Abo bose uko ari bane babyawe na cya gihanda cy’i Gati, bicwa na Dawidi n’abagaragu be.
2_samweli:22:1: Indirimbo ya Dawidi (Zab. 18)1.Dawidi yabwiye Uwiteka amagambo y’iyi ndirimbo, umunsi Uwiteka yamukirije amaboko y’abanzi be bose n’aya Sawuli, aravuga ati
2_samweli:22:2: 2.“Uwiteka ni igitare cyanjye, Ni igihome cyanjye, Ni umukiza wanjye ubwanjye.
2_samweli:22:3: 3.Ni Imana igitare cyanjye, Ni yo nziringira. Ni yo ngabo inkingira, Ni ihembe ry’agakiza kanjye, Ni igihome cyanjye kirekire kinkingira, Ni ubuhungiro bwanjye. Ni umukiza wanjye unkiza urugomo.
2_samweli:22:4: 4.Ndambaza Uwiteka, ukwiriye gushimwa, Ni ko nzakizwa abanzi banjye.
2_samweli:22:5: 5.“Imiraba y’urupfu yarangose, Imyuzure y’ubugoryi yanteye ubwoba.
2_samweli:22:6: 6.Ingoyi z’ikuzimu zantaye hagati, Ibigoyi by’urupfu byantanze imbere.
2_samweli:22:7: 7.Mu mubabaro wanjye nambaje Uwiteka, Ni koko natakiye Imana yanjye, Yumvira ijwi ryanjye mu rusengero rwayo, Ibyo nayitakiye biyinjira mu matwi.
2_samweli:22:8: 8.“Maze isi iratigita, ihinda umushyitsi, Imfatiro z’ijuru ziranyeganyega, Zitigiswa n’uburakari bwayo.
2_samweli:22:9: 9.Umwotsi ucumba mu mazuru yayo, Umuriro uva mu kanwa kayo, uratwika, Havamo n’amakara yaka.
2_samweli:22:10: 10.Yunamisha ijuru, iramanuka, Umwijima w’icuraburindi wari munsi y’ibirenge byayo.
2_samweli:22:11: 11.Iguruka ihetswe na Kerubi, Ni ukuri ibonwa ku mababa y’umuyaga.
2_samweli:22:12: 12.Umwijima iwugira ihema ryayo riyigose, Igotwa n’ibirundo by’amazi, Ni byo bicu bya rukokoma byo mu ijuru.
2_samweli:22:13: 13.Ubwiza burabagirana buri imbere yayo, Butuma amakara yaka.
2_samweli:22:14: 14.Uwiteka ahindishiriza inkuba mu ijuru, Usumbabyose avuga ijwi rye.
2_samweli:22:15: 15.Arasa imyambi ye arabatatanya, Ni yo mirabyo ibakura umutima.
2_samweli:22:16: 16.Maze ubutaka bwo hasi y’inyanja buraboneka, Imfatiro z’isi ziratwikururwa, Ku bwo guhana k’Uwiteka, Ku bw’inkubi y’umwuka uva mu mazuru ye.
2_samweli:22:17: 17.“Ari mu ijuru, arambura ukuboko aramfata, Ankura mu mazi y’isanzure.
2_samweli:22:18: 18.Ankiza umwanzi wanjye ukomeye n’abanyambaraga, Kuko bandushaga amaboko.
2_samweli:22:19: 19.Bari baranteye ku munsi nagiriyeho amakuba, Ariko Uwiteka ni we wambereye ubwishingikirizo.
2_samweli:22:20: 20.Abinkuramo anshyira ahantu hagari, Yankirije kuko yanyishimiraga.
2_samweli:22:21: 21.“Uwiteka yangororeye ibikwiye gukiranuka kwanjye, Nk’uko amaboko yanjye atanduye, Ni ko yangiriye.
2_samweli:22:22: 22.Kuko nitondeye inzira z’Uwiteka, Kandi ntakoze icyaha cyo kureka Imana yanjye,
2_samweli:22:23: 23.Kuko amateka yayo yose yari imbere yanjye, Kandi amategeko yayo sinyaveho.
2_samweli:22:24: 24.Naramutunganiraga, Nirinze gukiranirwa kwanjye.
2_samweli:22:25: 25.Ni cyo cyatumye Uwiteka anyitura ibikwiriye gukiranuka kwanjye, Kandi ibikwiriye kutandura kwanjye imbere ye.
2_samweli:22:26: 26.“Ku munyambabazi uziyerekana nk’umunyambabazi, Ku utunganye, uziyerekana nk’utunganye,
2_samweli:22:27: 27.Ku utanduye, uziyerekana nk’utanduye. Ku kigoryi, uziyerekana nk’ugoramye.
2_samweli:22:28: 28.Abacishijwe bugufi ni bo uzakiza, Ariko igitsure cyawe kiri ku bibone, Kugira ngo ubacishe bugufi.
2_samweli:22:29: 29.Ni wowe tabaza ryanjye, Uwiteka, Uwiteka ni we uvira umwijima wanjye.
2_samweli:22:30: 30.Kuko ari wowe umpa gutwaranira umutwe w’ababisha, Kandi ari wowe Imana yanjye impa gusimbuka inkike z’ibihome.
2_samweli:22:31: 31.“Inzira y’Imana itungana rwose, Ijambo ry’Uwiteka ryaravugutiwe, Ni ingabo ikingira abamwiringira bose.
2_samweli:22:32: 32.Ni nde Mana itari Uwiteka? Ni nde gitare kitari Imana yacu?
2_samweli:22:33: 33.Imana ni igihome cyanjye gikomeye, Ishorerera umukiranutsi mu nzira yayo.
2_samweli:22:34: 34.Ihindura ibirenge bye nk’iby’imparakazi, Impagarika ku misozi yanjye.
2_samweli:22:35: 35.Yigisha amaboko yanjye kurasana, Bituma amaboko yanjye afora umuheto w’icyuma.
2_samweli:22:36: 36.Kandi wampaye ingabo inkingira, Ni yo gakiza kawe, Ubugwaneza bwawe bwampinduye ukomeye.
2_samweli:22:37: 37.Intambwe zanjye wazāguriye inzira, Ibirenge byanjye ntibyanyereye.
2_samweli:22:38: 38.“Nirukanye ababisha banjye ndabarimbura, Sinagaruka kugeza aho barimbukiye.
2_samweli:22:39: 39.Narabarimbuye ndabamenagura babura uko babyuka, Ni koko baguye munsi y’ibirenge byanjye.
2_samweli:22:40: 40.Wankenyeje imbaraga zo kurwana, Abampagurukiye bakantera warabancogoreje.
2_samweli:22:41: 41.Watumye ababisha banjye bampa ibitugu, Kugira ngo ndimbure abanyanga.
2_samweli:22:42: 42.Barakebaguje, babura ubakiza, Batumbiriye Uwiteka ntiyabarora.
2_samweli:22:43: 43.Maze mbasya nk’umukungugu, Mbaribata nk’ibyondo byo mu nzira, ndabatatanya.
2_samweli:22:44: 44.“Kandi wankijije imirwano y’abantu banjye, Wandindirije kuzaba umutware w’amahanga, Ishyanga ntigeze kumenya rizankorera.
2_samweli:22:45: 45.Abanyamahanga bazanyoboka, Nibamara kumva inkuru yanjye, bazanyumvira.
2_samweli:22:46: 46.Abanyamahanga bazacogora, Bazava mu bihome byabo bahinde imishyitsi.
2_samweli:22:47: 47.“Uwiteka ahoraho, Igitare cyanjye gihimbazwe, Imana y’igitare cy’agakiza kanjye ishyirwe hejuru.
2_samweli:22:48: 48.Ni yo Mana imporera, Ikangomorera amahanga nkayatwara,
2_samweli:22:49: 49.Ikankura mu babisha banjye. Ni koko unshyira hejuru y’abampagurukiye, Unkiza umunyarugomo.
2_samweli:22:50: 50.Ni cyo kizatuma ngushimira mu mahanga, Uwiteka, Ndirimba ishimwe ry’izina ryawe.
2_samweli:22:51: 51.Uwo yimitse amuha agakiza gakomeye, Agirira imbabazi uwo yimikishije amavuta, Ni we Dawidi n’urubyaro rwe iteka ryose.”
2_samweli:23:1: 1.Aya ni yo magambo ya Dawidi aheruka. Dawidi mwene Yesayi washyizwe ejuru, aravuga ati “Uwo Imana ya Yakobo yimikishije amavuta, Umuhimbyi w’igikundiro wa zaburi za Isirayeli.
2_samweli:23:2: 2.“Umwuka w’Uwiteka yavugiye muri jye, Ijambo rye ryari ku rurimi rwanjye.
2_samweli:23:3: 3.Imana ya Isirayeli yaravuze, Igitare cya Isirayeli yarabimbwiye iti ‘Utegekesha abantu gukiranuka,Agatwara yubaha Imana,
2_samweli:23:4: 4.Azahwana n’umuseke utambitse w’izuba rirashe, N’igitondo kitagira igicu, Igihe ubwatsi bushya bwarukiye mu butaka, Ku bw’itangaze ry’umuhituko w’imvura.’
2_samweli:23:5: 5.“Ni koko, inzu yanjye ntimeze ityo ku Mana, Nyamara yasezeranye nanjye isezerano ritazakuka, Ritunganye muri bose kandi rikomeye, Kuko ari yo gakiza kanjye rwose, Kandi ririmo ibyo nifuza byose, nubwo itabikuza.
2_samweli:23:6: 6.Ariko abatubaha Imana bose bazahwana n’amahwa asunikwa, Kuko nta wushobora kuyafatisha intoki.
2_samweli:23:7: 7.Ahubwo uyakoraho wese, Akwiye kwitwaza icumu cyangwa uruti rw’icumu, Kandi azatwikīrwa rwose ahantu hayo.”
2_samweli:23:8: Iby’ubutwari ingabo za Dawidi zakoze (1 Ngoma 11.10-47)8.Aya ni yo mazina y’abantu b’intwari ba Dawidi: Yoshebubashebeti w’i Takemoni, yari ingenzi mu bandi batware, Adino w’Umwezini na we ni uko. Umunsi umwe yicishije icumu rye abantu magana inani, bagwira icyarimwe.
2_samweli:23:9: 9.Akurikirwa na Eleyazari mwene Dodo umwana w’Umwahohi. Yari uwo muri abo bagabo batatu b’intwari bari bari kumwe na Dawidi, ubwo basuzuguzaga Abafilisitiya bari bateraniye kurwana, Abisirayeli bamaze guhunga.
2_samweli:23:10: 10.Arahaguruka yica Abafilisitiya, ukuboko kwe kugwa ikinya, kumiranwa inkota. Uwo munsi Uwiteka amuha kunesha cyane, abantu baherako baramugarukira bazanywe no kwayanwa iminyago gusa.
2_samweli:23:11: 11.Akurikirwa na Shama mwene Ageye w’Umuharari. Abafilisitiya bari bateranye umutwe umwe umwe mu murima wuzuye udushyimbo dutoya, abantu bahunga Abafilisitiya.
2_samweli:23:12: 12.Ariko we yihagararira mu murima hagati, awurindiramo yica Abafilisitiya, nuko Uwiteka amuha kunesha cyane.
2_samweli:23:13: 13.Bukeye abatatu bo muri mirongo itatu y’ingenzi baramanuka, basanga Dawidi mu buvumo bwa Adulamu mu isarura, kandi umutwe w’Abafilisitiya wari ugerereje mu kibaya cya Refayimu.
2_samweli:23:14: 14.Icyo gihe Dawidi yari mu gihome, kandi abanyagihome cy’Abafilisitiya bari i Betelehemu.
2_samweli:23:15: 15.Dawidi akumbuye aravuga ati “Icyampa nkabona unsomya ku mazi y’iriba ryo ku irembo ry’i Betelehemu.”
2_samweli:23:16: 16.Maze abo bagabo b’intwari uko ari batatu batwaranira mu ngabo z’Abafilisitiya, bavoma amazi muri iryo riba ryo ku irembo ry’i Betelehemu, barayajyana bayashyira Dawidi ariko yanga kuyanywa, ahubwo ayabyarira imbere y’Uwiteka.
2_samweli:23:17: 17.Aravuga ati “Ntibikabeho Uwiteka, kuba nakora ntyo. Ndebe nywe amaraso y’abantu bahaze amagara yabo?” Ni cyo cyatumye yanga kuyanywa. Ibyo ni byo byakozwe n’abo bagabo b’intwari uko ari batatu.
2_samweli:23:18: 18.Kandi Abishayi mwene se wa Yowabu mwene Seruya, ni we wari umutware w’abo batatu. Yakaraze icumu rye yica abantu magana atatu, maze asangira n’abo batatu izina ry’uburangirire.
2_samweli:23:19: 19.Mbese ubwo ntiyari umunyacyubahiro muri abo batatu? Ni cyo cyatumye aba umutware wabo. Ariko rero ntiyagera kuri ba batatu ba mbere.
2_samweli:23:20: 20.Kandi Benaya mwene Yehoyada umwana w’umugabo w’intwari w’i Kabuseli, yari yarakoze ibikomeye. Ni we wishe bene Ariyeli w’i Mowabu bombi, kandi aramanuka yicira intare mu isenga mu gihe cya shelegi.
2_samweli:23:21: 21.Yishe n’umugabo mwiza w’Umunyegiputa. Uwo Munyegiputa yari yitwaje icumu, ariko we amanuka yitwaje inkoni, aramusanga amushikuza icumu mu ntoki ze, ararimwicisha.
2_samweli:23:22: 22.Ibyo ni byo Benaya mwene Yehoyada yakoze, yamamara muri abo bagabo batatu b’intwari.
2_samweli:23:23: 23.Yarushaga icyubahiro ba bandi mirongo itatu, ariko ntagere kuri ba batatu ba mbere. Maze Dawidi amugira umutware w’abarinzi be.
2_samweli:23:24: 24.Asaheli murumuna wa Yowabu yari umwe muri ba babandi mirongo itatu, hamwe na Eluhanani mwene Dodo w’i Betelehemu,
2_samweli:23:25: 25.na Shama w’i Harodi na Elika w’i Harodi,
2_samweli:23:26: 26.na Helesi w’i Paluti na Ira mwene Ikeshi w’i Tekowa,
2_samweli:23:27: 27.na Abiyezeri w’Umunyanatoti na Mebunayi w’Umuhusha,
2_samweli:23:28: 28.na Salumoni Umwahohi na Maharayi w’i Netofa,
2_samweli:23:29: 29.na Helebu mwene Bāna w’i Netofa na Itayi mwene Ribayi w’i Gibeya y’Ababenyamini,
2_samweli:23:30: 30.na Benaya w’i Piratoni na Hidaya w’imigezi y’i Gāshi,
2_samweli:23:31: 31.na Abiyaluboni w’Umunyaraba na Azimaveti w’Umunyabahurimu,
2_samweli:23:32: 32.na Eliyahaba w’i Shālabini, na bene Yasheni na Yonatani,
2_samweli:23:33: 33.na Shāma w’i Harari na Ahiyamu mwene Sharari wa Arari,
2_samweli:23:34: 34.na Elifeleti mwene Ahasubayi umuhungu wa wa Munyamāka, na Eliyamu mwene Ahitofeli w’i Gilo,
2_samweli:23:35: 35.na Hesironi w’i Karumeli na Parayi wa Arubi,
2_samweli:23:36: 36.na Igalu mwene Natani w’i Soba na Bani w’i Gadi,
2_samweli:23:37: 37.na Seleki w’Umwamoni na Naharayi w’i Bēroti, abatwaraga intwaro za Yowabu mwene Seruya,
2_samweli:23:38: 38.na Ira w’Umuyeteri na Garebu w’Umuyeteri,
2_samweli:23:39: 39.na Uriya w’Umuheti. Bose ni mirongo itatu na barindwi.
2_samweli:24:1: Dawidi abara abantu (1 Ngoma 21.1-27)1.Bukeye umujinya w’Uwiteka wongera gukongerezwa Abisirayeli, abateza Dawidi, ubwo yavugaga ati “Genda ubare Abisirayeli n’Abayuda.”
2_samweli:24:2: 2.Umwami abwira Yowabu umugaba w’ingabo ze wari kumwe na we ati “Genda imiryango y’Abisirayeli yose uhereye i Dani ukageza i Bērisheba, mubare abantu kugira ngo menye umubare wabo.”
2_samweli:24:3: 3.Yowabu abwira umwami ati “Uwiteka Imana yawe igwize umubare wari usanzwe incuro ijana, kandi umwami abyirebere. ariko se Mwami nyagasani, ni iki gitumye wishimira ibyo?”
2_samweli:24:4: 4.Ariko ijambo ry’umwami riganza irya Yowabu n’abatware b’ingabo. Nuko Yowabu n’abatware b’ingabo bava imbere y’umwami bajya kubara Abisirayeli.
2_samweli:24:5: 5.Barahaguruka bambuka Yorodani, bagandika muri Aroweri mu ruhande rw’iburyo bw’umudugudu wari hagati mu kibaya cy’i Gadi, berekeye i Yazeri.
2_samweli:24:6: 6.Baherako basohora i Galeyadi no mu gihugu cy’i Tahatimuhodishi, kandi bagera i Daniyāni barazenguruka barinda bagera i Sidoni.
2_samweli:24:7: 7.Bukeye basohora mu gihugu cy’i Tiro no mu midugudu yose y’Abahivi n’iy’Abanyakanāni, bagarukira ikusi h’i Buyuda i Bērisheba.
2_samweli:24:8: 8.Bamaze kugenda igihugu cyose, basubira i Yerusalemu bamaze amezi cyenda n’iminsi makumyabiri.
2_samweli:24:9: 9.Maze Yowabu aha umwami umubare w’abantu babaze. Muri Isirayeli harimo abagabo b’intwari bitwaza inkota, uduhumbi munani, abo mu Bayuda na bo bari uduhumbi dutanu.
2_samweli:24:10: Imana iha Dawidi igihano10.Dawidi amaze kubara abantu, umutima we uramukubita. Abwira Uwiteka ati “Ndacumuye cyane ku byo nkoze ibyo, ariko none Uwiteka ndakwinginze, kuraho gukiranirwa k’umugaragu wawe kuko nkoze iby’ubupfu bwinshi.”
2_samweli:24:11: 11.Dawidi yibambuye mu gitondo, ijambo ry’Uwiteka ribonekera umuhanuzi Gadi bamenya wa Dawidi riti
2_samweli:24:12: 12.“Genda ubwire Dawidi uti ‘Uku ni ko Uwiteka avuze ngo: Agushyize imbere ibihano bitatu, hitamo kimwe muri byo abe ari cyo aguhanisha.’ ”
2_samweli:24:13: 13.Nuko Gadi ajya kwa Dawidi arabimubwira, aravuga ati “Mbese urashaka ko inzara yatera mu gihugu cyawe ikamara imyaka irindwi? Cyangwa se ni uko wajya uhunga ababisha bawe bakugenza ukamara amezi atatu, cyangwa ni uko mugiga yatera mu gihugu cyawe ikamara iminsi itatu? Nuko wigire inama umenye icyo njya gusubiza Iyantumye.”
2_samweli:24:14: 14.Dawidi abwira Gadi ati “Ndashobewe rwose, twigwire mu maboko y’Uwiteka kuko imbabazi ze ari nyinshi, ne kugwa mu maboko y’abantu.”
2_samweli:24:15: 15.Nuko Uwiteka ateza Isirayeli mugiga, uhereye muri icyo gitondo ukageza igihe cyategetswe. Hapfa abantu inzovu ndwi, uhereye i Dani ukageza i Bērisheba.
2_samweli:24:16: 16.Ariko marayika agitunze ukuboko kwe kuri Yerusalemu ngo aharimbure, Uwiteka arakuruka iyo nabi, abwira marayika warimburaga abantu ati “Birahagije, noneho unamura ukuboko kwawe.” Kandi marayika uwo w’Uwiteka yari bugufi bw’imbuga ya Arawuna w’Umuyebusi.
2_samweli:24:17: 17.Dawidi abonye marayika wishe abantu, abwira Uwiteka ati “Umva naracumuye kandi nabaye ikigoryi, ariko nk’izi ntama zacumuye iki? Ndakwinginze, ukuboko kwawe abe ari jye kurwanya n’inzu ya data.”
2_samweli:24:18: Dawidi atanga igitambo cy’impongano18.Uwo munsi Gadi asanga Dawidi aramubwira ati “Zamuka wubakire Uwiteka igicaniro ku mbuga ya Arawuna w’Umuyebusi.”
2_samweli:24:19: 19.Dawidi arazamuka nk’uko Gadi yamubwiye ko ari ko Uwiteka yategetse.
2_samweli:24:20: 20.Arawuna arungurutse abona umwami n’abagaragu be baza bamusanga. Arawuna arasohoka yikubita hasi imbere y’umwami yubamye.
2_samweli:24:21: 21.Arawuna arabaza ati “Mwami nyagasani, uzanywe n’iki ku mugaragu wawe?” Dawidi aramusubiza ati “Nzanywe no kugura imbuga yawe ngo nubakire Uwiteka igicaniro, kugira ngo mugiga ive mu bantu.”
2_samweli:24:22: 22.Arawuna abwira Dawidi ati “Umwami databuja najyane ibyo ashatse byose abitange. Dore ngizi inka z’igitambo cyoswa, n’ibihurisho n’amatandiko y’inka mubigire inkwi.
2_samweli:24:23: 23.Ibi byose nyagasani, jye Arawuna mbihaye umwami.” Arongera abwira umwami ati “Uwiteka Imana yawe igushime.”
2_samweli:24:24: 24.Ariko umwami abwira Arawuna ati “Oya, ahubwo ndabigura nawe ntange igiciro cyabyo, sinabasha gutambira Uwiteka Imana yanjye ibitambo byoswa, ntabitanzeho ibyanjye.” Nuko Dawidi agura iyo mbuga n’inka, atanga shekeli z’ifeza mirongo itanu.
2_samweli:24:25: 25.Dawidi yubakirayo Uwiteka igicaniro, atamba ibitambo byoswa, n’ibitambo by’ishimwe yuko ari amahoro. Nuko Uwiteka abona guhendahenderwa igihugu, mugiga ishira mu Bisirayeli.
